name: Prison Boss: Prohibition
description: Prison Boss Prohibition is a VR crafting game where you play as a shop owner smuggling prohibited stuff. Produce and sell beers, erotic magazines, cigarettes, and more! But watch out, the police are cracking down on contraband!

name: Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double
description: Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double is an immersive adventure game where you investigate urband legends in a modern city.

name: Revenge Crystal
description: Revenge Crystal is an epic top-down action RPG. You explore a defeated world by unknown invaders as an amnesiac knight who must save the world and defeat the invaders by navigating through a world of interconnected challenges, fierce enemies, and intricate puzzles.

name: Speed Box
description: Immerse yourself in "Speed Box," a unique puzzle game experience where strategic thinking meets captivating challenges. Developed by the innovative minds at Yellow Panda Games, Speed Box tests your problem-solving skills in a beautifully designed, minimalist world.

name: Battle of BackYard
description: Engage in thrilling household air battles in this wacky game. Choose your role as a skilled pilot or a sharp-shooting gunner, and customize your aircraft to fit your preferred playstyle. Take on daring missions or challenge friends in multiplayer combat. Relive history and dominate the skies!

name: Paperhead
description:
PAPERHEAD is a fast-paced FPS game set in a world where everything is made out of cardboard and paper but is infested with horror!
Use a pencil as a weapon and explore what exactly went wrong in the secret research facility and why suddenly papercut people were able to...bleed.
Paperhead's Main Features

- Cardboard cute style with a horror twist. Cute but horrifying!

- Brutal and fast-paced combat. Slide to throw enemies in the air, kick explosive barrels into them (or enemies themselves!), and jump onto them Mario-style.

- Use a Pencil as a weapon. Draw a bomb to explode enemies!

- Use a Pencil as a reality-warping puzzle-solving tool. Not sure how to get through? Try to draw a door on the wall!

WHY WOULD PAPER...BLEED?

name: Ammossum
description: Dive into this action roguelite as a brave Possum, shooting down crowds of crazy beasts. Drink cactus booze, ride your train through the deserts, and feel the thrill of bloody shootouts! Whistling bullets, explosions, flying arrows, mines, fire, and acid — bring this chaos under control!

name: Mimic
description: A multiplayer survival horror game where players must choose their allies carefully to survive imminent danger. In this social-deduction game players won't know who to trust with their lives.

name: Vangaro Tactics
description: Command colorful troops into tactical turn-based battles in Vangaro Tactics! Infiltrate enemy outposts on the Stealth Missions: mine, recruit, move wisely, and you'll stand a chance. Know your commanders and exclusive units to make the most of each faction.

name: Mutants Ate My Carrots
description: A fairytale forest in decay. A black rabbit ready to fight... and a king lion who only looks out for himself. Unlock new skills and discover who stole your carrots in a humorous adventure full of fun puzzles and mutated kickass moves.

name: Dino Tower Arena
description: Lets beat'em all! In this dinosaur combat roguelike, you will build and upgrade your own dinosaur with lots of special abilities and fight over enemy dinosaurs while going up the floors of a enormous tower

name: Escape The Charon
description: Escape the Charon is a sci-fi adventure meant to be played in one sitting. An ancient alien artifact has been brought to the space station Charon - soon after, the Charon goes dark. James West must search for clues and solve the mystery to discover what went wrong.

name: Disco Samurai
description: Disco Samurai is a unique rhythm combat game in a cyberpunk setting. Challenge your skills by smoothly combining attacks, parries, dashes and other abilities to the beat of the electronic music. Crank up the volume and seize the rhythm of the electrifying soundscape of synthwave and rock!

name: The Crazy Hyper-Dungeon Chronicles
description: Dive into a 2D roguelite dungeon-crawler with top-down views in glorious pixel art. Experience turn-based combat with arcade thrills, where weapons are extensions of your character with unique abilities. Each level is its own universe, endlessly reinventing itself for ever-changing challenges.

name: Vivid World
description: A follow-up to the hit game Vivid Knight, Vivid World is a completely new party-building, roguelike strategy game! Our story takes place in the Netherworld, a land ruled by demons. Utilize and master our protagonist, Lemuria's new Jewel Magic to conquer strange dungeons.

name: The Chronos Event
description: The Chronos Event is a fast-paced third-person shooter that emphasizes the tactics of time travel and fast, aggressive play. Players rewind time, battling alongside their younger selves against overwhelming opposition.

name: Cute Survivors The Musical
description: A musical rogue-like adventure where you lead a band of adorable cats. Feel the rhythm-based abilities to unlock new band members, levels, and songs. Each member brings unique instruments and abilities, allowing you to overcome the hordes of enemies with the power of music!

name: KnockedDown
description: Race as a cop, take down criminals in this thrilling low-poly game. Fast action, challenging obstacles. Join the chase!

name: Private Military Manager: Tactical Auto Battler
description: You are the CEO of a private military company. Recruit capable mercenaries, purchase weapons, and develop your mercenaries according to their roles and characteristics. Observe how your mercenaries perform in combat and plan your tactics to ensure mission success.

name: Memento Dawn
description: A colorful puzzle game that follows a lost child on a journey to search for her memories and helps her through the darkness by controlling light and shadow.

name: Ada: Tainted Soil
description: Step into the world of Ada, a story-driven single-player 2D top-down action RPG with fast-paced combat and stunning visuals to enjoy. Combine different weapons, spells, and skills to overcome all obstacles in your way. Be prepared for the unexpected.

name: The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily
description: The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily is a turn-based stratergy game. The villainess Scarlet, deceived and falsely accused of killing of the King, becomes the first streamer. Through this, she uses manipulates and diversion to rebel against the vast military force of the Imperial Kingdom.

name: LightSup!
description: LightSup! is a couch-action co-op game for 1-4 players with rogue-lite elements where you play as adventurers encounter ferocious monsters crawling from the Eclipse Dungeons. Prepare your weapons and protect the Altar of Light at any cost, or the world will be doomed into darkness forever.

name: The Ripe Blood Anthology: This World Is Just for the Two of Us
description: Take on the role of Derek — the police chief in a small town. Make decisions that will change the course of the story. Unravel the mystery behind the peculiar behavior of Derek's boyfriend, Chris, and his younger sister. The graphic style is inspired by bara-manga and colorful line art.

name: To the Dungeon!
description: Explore the depths of this massive dungeon with your adorable companion Una in this exciting deck-building adventure!

name: Fretless: The Wrath of Riffson
description: In this turned-based RPG, wield powerful legendary instruments, gather mighty riff attacks and save the land from Rick Riffson's devilish goons and musical hybrid monsters!

name: Arcane Revolt
description: Arcane Revolt is an action role-playing game with pixel graphics. Lead a revolution as a powerful mage against tyrants in a fantasy medieval world. Customize your spells and make decisions that will benefit your cause in battle. Improve your spells, start the rebellion, and bring down the order!

name: Montaro 2
description: Montaro, master of stealth, sneakily infiltrating a convenience store with nobody being none the wiser. A stealth puzzle game where you manipulate objects and NPCs to complete objectives, "stealing pantsu".

name: Chronomon
description: Chronomon is a monster taming JRPG game with retro pixel art graphics. Explore a branching storyline, Capture and train over 50+ Chronomon. Battle other trainers in this one of a kind, multi-platform game.

name: Primal Fray
description: Primal Fray is a turn-based strategy roguelite. Enter the Rift and fight your way through enemies while building a team of primals and collecting buffs along the way. Outmaneuver your foes and surprise them with powerful combos of a well-built and synergistic team to learn the truth about the Rift.

name: The Idolmaster Tours
description:
THE iDOLM@STER TOURS is an upcoming arcade game that was first announced on February 10th, 2023, at Japan Amusement Expo 2023. It will be the first mainline arcade game since the original game. The graphics and models from Starlit Season have been carried over with some adjustments and additional models for the newly added characters.

The first location test began in the summer of 2023, and a second location test began in summer of 2024. The game is set to be released in Spring 2025.

name: Moth Kubit
description: This is an RPG about corporate life as an ordinary insect. Our protagonist, Moth Kubit, has just been promoted, and all of a sudden embarks on a weird adventure in a megacorp to redeem (or eradicate) himself, his bug-ddies and the company before the mysterious "Final Process" arrives.

name: Shark Rain
description: The very first Shark-Based Shooter game! Become a cute shark-girl and speed through water then emerge in human form and blast your enemies to oblivion! Nowhere will they be safe, not even on land!

name: Death By Misstep
description: Death By Misstep is an upcoming First-Person Rhythm, Stealth and Horror game set on a party cruise where a massive massacre by robots is happening.

name: Never Ending Beyond
description: The only roguelite where you must pet animals to survive. Each animal comes with its own unique weapons and passive abilities. Pet animals, mixing and matching abilities to create unique skill builds and conquer the Beyond.

name: Red Rebellion
description: A sapphic fairy tale mashup as Robin Hood teams up with Red Riding Hood to save their town, in this yuri / lesbian historical fantasy.

name: Daomei Village
description: You have been banished to Daomei Village for your offense. In order to return to the Emperor's favor, you must make an effort. Repair, build, cultivate fields and fight various adversities. Meet new friends and learn their stories. Do whatever it takes not to be banished forever!

name: Star Vortex
description: Humanity is being pushed to the brink of annihilation by invading forces. As one of the few remaining combat pilots, you must fight the enemies of humanity. Rebuild your ship, salvage ancient technology, and turn the enemy's weapons against them.

name: Islands & Trains
description: Build Islands. And Trains. No goals, no timer, no stress. Just build, relax, enjoy.

name: Interwoven
description: Welcome to Interwoven - a compact, but dynamic adventure inspired by traditional turn-based JRPGs! Follow an unlikely trio on their journey up to defeat the Obsidian Drake atop Anvite Mountain. Use the unique Augment Battle System to create all sorts of interesting strategies.

name: PaperKlay
description: PaperKlay is a short and sweet 3D platformer where you unfold, open and rotate the paper environment in order to freely explore the cardboard world.

name: Olliefrog Toad Skater
description: Olliefrog Toad Skater is the amphibian-based skateboarding game where its easy to be steezy! Create your own little custom cute frog or toad and hit up the local skatepark for a brief skating session, or tackle the more extensive story/career modes and ollie, grind, and kickflip your way to the top.

name: Ragdoll LABS
description: Ragdoll LABS is a game of action, physics, and lots of laughs, where you control a ragdoll in wild and varied simulations. Have fun watching your enemies failing miserably, unlock items to give your beloved ragdoll a unique look, create your own simulations, or play in others developed by the community.

name: Nivalis
description: Grow your business, manage restaurants and nightclubs, make friends and enemies, buy and decorate apartments, go fishing and maybe even find love in Nivalis, the city that stretches from the ocean to the clouds.

name: Bits & Bops
description: Bits & Bops is a collection of original rhythm mini-games. Featuring over 20 mini-games filled with catchy music, snappy gameplay and gorgeous, hand-drawn animation, Bits & Bops is sure to brighten your day.

name: Pivot of Hearts
description: Game developer Wén Xiàn has a second chance at love, but it’s not what he expects. Will he be able to stray off the beaten path and find true happiness? Play your cards right and find out in Pivot of Hearts, a non-monogamous visual novel!

name: Rise of the Robots X
description: Rise of the Robots X (RoRx) is an online futuristic card-based strategy game played on a hexagonal grid battleground. Played on a hexagonal grid battleground, each game is an opportunity to refine your army and get better Robots, Buildings or Masteries!

name: High Elo Girls
description: High Elo Girls is a Visual Novel set in the esports scene where you play as the latest recruit for a new all-girls team. Can you help your squad achieve their true potential, or will you only squander your own?

name: Decide 4 God
description: Six of them wanted out. Six of them wanted in. Now, all twelve of them are trapped in a prison where a fate worse than death awaits them. Can they survive the wiles of Empathy Systems? What dark secrets lurk behind that institution? It is for the future when none may tread.

name: Sondro Gomez: A Sunova Story
description: "Sondro Gomez: A Sunova Story" is an action-adventure platformer following the story of a failing musician named Sondro, who must seek and recover the wish-granting Mystic Orbs to repay his debt to the mysterious Masked Man. Can he find them before the many rogues of Sunova beat him to the punch?

name: Silly Polly Beast
description: This story is about a girl who, by the will of fate, faced the beast, and in order to become free she was forced to study its nature. A story-driven roguelike with aggressive gunfights and terrifying monsters awaits you. How far can you go in the fight for your freedom?

name: Sparkball
description: Sparkball is a 4v4 adrenaline-packed ‘sports brawler’ where players select from a cast of lovably unique heroes and carefully balance both ballin' and brawlin' to score in the enemy team's goal! Affectionately described as League of Legends meets Rocket League (or Kung Fu-tbol!), Sparkball grips you immediately with its dopamine-inducing take on combat sports and keeps you coming back for more as you strive to master its surprisingly complex strategies.

name: Eden.schemata();
description: EDEN.schemata(); is a multi-ending sci-fi mystery adventure game, featuring headless corpses, a sealed laboratory, a limbless android suspect/heroine, and an amnesiac protagonist. The game design and gradually UI change in reflection of your actions.

name: Zodiac Legion
description: Zodiac Legion is a turn-based tactical Role-Playing-Game featuring lethal combat, squad management and strategic elements. Lead your heroes through daring raids and forgotten ruins, defend your land in a time of conquest and betrayal, and master the secrets of volatile ancient magic to restore a realm beset by the armies of undying fiendish sorcerers.

name: Dewdrop Dynasty
description: Run, dash, and crawl your way through a fast, Metroidvania. Battle with giant bosses, find new guns and abilities, meet quirky characters, and most importantly find your way home.

name: Slaves of Magic
description: Slaves of Magic is a fantasy turn-based tactical RPG in which you have to lead the resistance against the invaders. You will have to find ways to slow down their forces, till you can learn their most powerful weapon, the use of elemental magic, and turn it against them.

name: Moroi
description: Moroi is a grimdark fairytale with an even darker sense of humor. Experience frantic combat, perplexing puzzles, and a twisting narrative anchored by a bizarre cast of characters. Can you break free from eternal madness?

name: Run TavernQuest
description: A role-reversing twist on old school text adventure games. You're the command parser and game master for an artificial player named STEVE. Who knew that running an RPG would be so frustrating?

name: Hotel Barcelona
description:
"Hotel Barcelona," where serial killers from all over the United States are said to have gathered. You must defeat them and check out before all the blood is spilled.

Japanese game creators SWERY65 and SUDA51 have teamed up to create this ambitious work. Don't miss it.

name: Overlook Trail
description: A mix of long remembered dreams and recurring fantasies. Overlook trail is a collection of short experiences, each with its unique form and purpose. Some of them are part of the real world.

name: Ship of Heroes
description: An MMORPG set hundreds of years in the future aboard the mega ship FHS Justice, super powered characters are an accepted part of society and integral to the ship's defense while it encounters other craft and alien worlds.

name: Moonlight Knight
description: Moonlight Knight is an action-slasher with RPG elements. Use sword, bow, magic and hook to fight your enemies. Loot gold, upgrade character stats, find unique items and unlock ultimate abilities to make it to the very end!

name: Hero's Odyssey
description: Awaken on the mysterious island of Damatheia with a Godly mission in your backlog. Forge bonds with unlikely allies, make life-altering choices, and battle the undead in this Visual Novel filled with secrets, minigames and multiple endings. What truths will you uncover... and at what cost?

name: Farland Saga II Saturn Tribute
description: Sin descripción

name: Farland Saga I Saturn Tribute
description: Sin descripción

name: ToHeart
description: The late-’90s landmark visual novel from AQUAPLUS is back and fully remade with 3D scenes and animations, full HD resolution, the choice between the original cast or all-new voiceovers, and international translations for the first time ever!

name: Backpack Monsters: Survivors
description: A PvP inventory management auto battler with evolution upgrades! Buy and update powerful monsters, then carefully arrange them in your grids.

name: Plantasia
description: Plantasia is a cozy semi-idle, gardening & puzzle game designed to sit at the bottom 1/3 of your screen so you can play in-between tasks without disrupting your work!

name: In the Abyss of Dream
description: Two worlds, one nightmare. Explore a gruesome orphanage, solve puzzles related to an inexplicable phenomenon, and dive into the depths of dreams to uncover otherworldly horrors. In the Abyss of Dream is a cosmic horror point-and-click game set during the Great Darkness.

name: Tron: Catalyst
description: The Arq Grid stands on the brink of collapse. With your Identity Disc and Light Cycle, fight to escape by wielding the power of the Glitch loop. Electrifying action and a rich story combine in a new adventure set within Disney’s iconic TRON universe.

name: Droid Escape
description: In this adventure, help Droid 07 to overcome challenges, discover mysteries and free your friend from the miniaigas.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Secret of the Mimic
description:
Enter the abandoned workshop of Murray’s Costume Manor and unravel the mystery left behind by the reclusive inventor, Edwin Murray. In Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic, you’ll step into a world where every dark corner holds a secret and every flicker of light hints at an ever-present threat. The Mimic, a prototype endoskeleton, can adapt to any costume and become any character, including what you fear most. Armed with only your wits, a few gadgets, and a heavily redacted corporate briefing, you’ll attempt to retrieve Fazbear’s prized prototype technology while grappling with cryptic clues and a relentless shadow determined to dispatch all unwanted company.

Prepare for heart-pounding thrills as you explore the labyrinth of the deserted Costume Manor, discovering remnants of Edwin’s unfinished work and eluding the monster he’s created. Experience Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic, survive the mystery and madness. Five Night’s at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic will be available for the PlayStation 5, Steam, and Epic Games Store on June 13th, 2025.

Disclaimer: Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for whatever you awaken in the dark.

name: Virtual Girl @ World's End
description: A visual novel developed by HEADLOCK about Virtual YouTubers in an apocalyptic world.

name: Rubber Sharks
description: Plunge into the tranquil existence of the sweet poolside life with the amazing company of peaceful Rubber Sharks. This adventure invites you to revel in the bliss of your cherished poolside sanctuary. But could there be a mystery hidden in this peaceful scene, or even more?

name: Natsume’s Book of Friends: Hazuki's Chronicle
description: Natsume’s Book of Friends: Hazuki's Chronicle is an adventure game where you can experience summer vacation in the world of “Natsume's Book of Friends”. As the protagonist Takashi Natsume, you are able to meet other friends and spirits and enjoy a wonderful summertime.

name: Architect Life: A House Design Simulator
description: Create the ideal home! From 3D plan modelling through to on-site decision-making, you must bring each project to life while adding your own creative touches, to take your architectural firm to the pinnacle of the profession.

name: The Little Pixel That Could
description: The Little Pixel That Could is puzzle-platformer about a daring pixel on a mission to delete the browser history of its enigmatic owner. Traverse hard drives and firewalls to piece together the fragmented memories of the owner's life.

name: Operation Remode
description: Sin descripción

name: Vespia: Shield of Aberration
description: Sin descripción

name: Expedition: Shadow World
description: Sin descripción

name: Stellar Blade x Goddess of Victory: Nikke
description: Sin descripción

name: Lesson
description: An upcoming adult boys' love visual novel developed by parade.

name: Quantum Witch
description: Wake up lovely, you've got things to do! First, find your lost flock of faer. Then find your wife, she'd look so cute wearing that flower you found. And if you have time, attack and dethrone god. Ok? Don't worry about that portal. I'm sure it's nothing. Now be careful. Every choice matters.

name: Date Everything!
description: Date Everything is a sandbox dating simulator set in the comfort of your own home, featuring 100 fully voice acted datable characters! Let the romance flow between your bed, smoke alarm and… Overwhelming Sense of Existential Dread? Are you ready to Date Everything?

name: Level Down
description: Crashed in space, surrounded by collapsing floors, reach for the top...

name: Heroes of Mount Dragon
description: Unleash your dragon-morphing powers in this action-packed side-scrolling brawler! Choose from 8 unique heroes, each with their own fighting style. Play couch co-op or online with up to 3 friends, uniting to defeat evil or competing for supremacy. A fun and accessible challenge for all skill levels!

name: Shatter and Spin
description: Play electronic gyro, memories of cyber childhood! In Shatter and Spiral, players will be able to modify their gyro partners and manipulate them to shatter enemies one by one!

name: RoadHouse Manager
description: Bartend and run a roadhouse in this AI-enhanced roguelite-sim! Patrons once impressed, will become permanent barflies that can be hired as staff, or sent on quests in the mysterious mist. Upgrade your roadhouse, hire a band, and build your Signature Cocktail, with 333 ingredients to choose from.

name: Cult of Abaruth
description: Have you always felt that you were destined for great things? Have you dreamed of being the leader of a dark cult? Or maybe you just love Dark Fantasy with a touch of humor? Now you have the opportunity to test your skills! Take on the role of a cult leader and lead him to glory!

name: Sword: Depths of the Void
description: Sword: Depths of the Void is WorthyWorm and The Sword Teams first upcoming game, releasing in 2025. Sword: Depths of the Void is a 2D Action RPG Platformer with a special sword that can morph it's blade into different weapons. Play as Trent Helms, the chosen one of this legendary sword, and make your way through various areas in open-world forms, bring people with you on your journey, explore a town in the sky, and much, much more.

name: Broken Arrow
description: Broken Arrow is a large-scale real-time modern warfare tactics game. The base game features both the American and Russian factions, more than 100 units and multiple deck specialisations per nation. Broken Arrow brings the genre to a whole new level by combining the complexity of a joint-forces wargame with the typical real-time tactics action-packed gameplay.

name: Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road
description: A brand new Inazuma Eleven game, returning to its roots! Play through the story mode with a new protagonist, and meet all characters from the series' long history in chronicle mode!

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign - Collector's Edition
description:
Collector's Edition Includes:

ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN Base Game (Physical disc for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X, physical STEAM voucher for STEAM) - ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN is a standalone adventure within the ELDEN RING universe, crafted to offer players a new gaming experience by reimagining the game’s core design.
Additional DLC* – Additional DLC that will be available after the release of the main game
Statue of Wylder - A perfect replica of the nomadic warrior, Wylder, a lone swordman in pursuit of the Night Lord. Crafted by Pure Arts. Size : 25cm
SteelBook - Premium metal case with a full-color illustration of Wylder. The perfect protection and display for your game disc
Nightfarer Cards - A set of eight high-quality tarot cards featuring detailed illustrations of the Nightfarers. These glossy, full color cards are the perfect way to predict your future in Limveld
Exclusive Hardcover Artbook - An exclusive 40-page artbook tracing the development of ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN through previously unseen concept art, sketches, and full color illustrations. Size: 24 x 21 cm Language: English
Digital Soundtrack Download Code - The unforgettable original soundtrack is included in this Collector’s Edition. Return to Limveld again and again with fully orchestrated tracks from ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN.
Collector’s Box - A beautiful case to store or display your statue and artbook.

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition Includes:
• ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN
• Additional DLC
- Additional playable characters and bosses
• Digital Artbook & Mini Soundtrack

name: Elden Ring: Nightreign
description: Elden Ring: Nightreign is a standalone adventure within the ELDEN RING universe, crafted to bring a new gaming experience.

name: Rune Factory: Guardians of Azuma
description: The classic action-RPG and life-simulation gameplay, beloved by Rune Factory fans across the globe, is taken in a bold new direction in Guardians of Azuma. This all-new adventure takes place in the never-before-seen eastern country of Azuma where you will assume the Earth Dancer powers and fight against the spreading Blight to bring hope back to this once-prosperous land.

name: Lost Soul Aside
description:
Embark on an epic odyssey to save your sister and the whole of humankind from dimensional invaders in a stylish single player action-adventure RPG.

Chain lightning-fast combos, learn new abilities, and upgrade your weapons as you take on formidable enemies and colossal bosses in fast, dynamic combat.

name: Night of the Stars
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Wings Reunion
description:
Sonic Wings Reunion is a sequel to the arcade-style shooter SONIC WINGS. The previous version was sold in 1998.

Choose from 8 characters and destroy the mysterious organization “Fatamornagana” that has progressed into the modern world. The scenario changes depending on the combination of characters.

The first new Sonic Wings (Aero Fighters) game in 26 years, with original staff members from the series involved in its planning, production, and oversight. This all-new installment in the classic vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up series is designed for all fans of the genre to enjoy.

name: Scar-Lead Salvation
description: Hard difficulty TPS roguelike with randomly generated dungeons. The protagonist, Willow Martin, has no memory of her past, but when a fight begins, her body moves naturally and she displays exceptional combat abilities.

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 3
description: The Fuga: Melodies of Steel series has reached its epic conclusion! Dive into this dramatic RPG featuring a brand-new, strategic battle system, enhanced Taranis training during intermission, and tactical route progression and event battles!

name: Fable Hospital
description: Embark on a hospital management game where you lead a medieval hospital and face comical diseases. Hire staff, design wards and assign tasks while your employees take care of patients in a hilarious way.

name: My Father Lied
description: My Father Lied is a first person point and click mystery game that tells the story of Huda, who finds herself following an unfathomable secret regarding her father’s 20 years disappearance.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.13 feat. V.W.P
description: Sin descripción

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.12 feat. V.I.P
description: Sin descripción

name: To a T
description: to a T is a 3D narrative adventure game developed by Keita Takahashi and the uvula team, with a strong focus on character, interaction, story and exploration. Play as a teenager (Teen), with a unique posture just trying to live a normal life in a small coastal town. Explore the town along with the help of Teen’s loyal dog and loving mother. While going to school and contending with bullies, Teen discovers a new ability granted to them by their extraordinary posture, and they start to uncover more about their mysterious lineage.

name: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny
description: Reclaim your destiny. Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny returns with higher resolution graphics and modernised controls to perform issen critical counter attacks and intense swordplay. Experience this dramatic revenge story set in Feudal Japan.

name: Blades of Fire
description: Introducing Blades of Fire, an all-new action adventure that takes you across a beautiful world full of uncertainty and challenge. You take on the role of Aran de Lira, firstborn of the King’s Ward. The newly crowned Queen Nerea has cast a powerful spell that turns steel into stone and only her arms of abominations wield the divine metal against which other blades shatter…

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed: Battle Destiny Remastered
description: Become a pilot in the world of Mobile Suit Gundam SEED, for the first time available with English localization! Engage in thrilling, action-packed Gundam battles, complete missions, and tune up your newly acquired Mobile Suits!

name: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time
description: Fantasy Life i: The Girl Who Steals Time is an RPG life-sim game and the long-awaited sequel to the 3DS classic Fantasy Life. This game will expand on what the original did, blending simulation with traditional action RPG combat mechanics.

name: RoadCraft
description: As the leader of a company specialized in restoring sites devastated by natural disasters, use your construction machinery to restart the local industry. Clear debris and faulty equipment, rebuild roads and bridges damaged by weather, and much more!

name: Dune: Awakening
description: Rise from survival to greatness and challenge the power of an Imperium in Dune: Awakening, a multiplayer survival game on a massive scale. Survive the sandworm, craft your ornithopter, build a fortress, and ascend to power on an open world Arrakis shared with hundreds of other players.

name: Virtue's Heaven
description: Virtue’s Heaven is an expressive, 2D action adventure. Explore a world that has been stuck in an endless day for as long as anyone can remember, free your friends from prison and gain enough Zeal to end the Age of Reason.

name: Capcom Fighting Collection 2
description:
Capcom's newest fighting collection hits the stage!

Choose from fan-favorite games like Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001 and Project Justice to 3D action games like Power Stone and Power Stone 2 in this collection of eight classic fighting games!

Each game in the collection can be played online or co-op!

Get back in the ring and duke it out in battles that everyone rumored, but no one believed!
Whether it's with a rival new or old, give it your all and strive for victory!

name: Super Cursor
description: Start your journey in Cursor Ville, where you'll be tested in your precision, agility, patience, and determination! Will you be able make your ways through the treacherous world and save your beloved princess? Aim, dodge, move, and most importantly, never give up!

name: Verses of Hope
description: Verses of Hope is a 2D platform game and interactive poetry adventure where you shape the world through the power of your words. Build your own poems to change the landscape and narrative.

name: Doom: The Dark Ages
description: DOOM: The Dark Ages is the prequel to the critically acclaimed DOOM (2016) and DOOM Eternal that tells the epic cinematic origin story of the DOOM Slayer’s rage. Players will step into the blood-stained boots of the DOOM Slayer, in this never-before-seen dark and sinister medieval war against Hell.

name: Doom: The Dark Ages - Premium Edition
description:
DOOM: The Dark Ages Premium Edition INCLUDES:
- Base Game
- Campaign DLC **
- Digital Artbook and Soundtrack
- Divinity Skin Pack

**DLC availability to be provided at a later date.

name: Hero World 2
description: Join Tom and Lisa in Hero World 2, a thrilling new adventure! Unlike the story-driven first installment, this sequel focuses on helping the duo collect fruits while introducing numerous upgrades and fresh features.

name: Tears of Vanfell
description: Tears of Vanfell is an action-packed dungeon crawler with roguelike and hack-'n-slash elements. Choose between a wide cast of characters and climb the Mountain as you swap weapons and grow stronger as a team of up to four player in online Co-op.

name: Open Air
description: Summer! Sea! Festival! You've been waiting for this for so long, and here you are! But what is it, why are the stages empty, and everybody around you is sad? Explore the island, learn the stories of the islanders, unlock new strengths during meditations and arrange the loudest and coolest festival!

name: The Midnight Walk
description:
Embark upon The Midnight Walk in this reverent dark fantasy adventure built in clay, from the minds behind Lost in Random and Fe.

Become The Burnt One, befriend a lost lantern creature named Potboy, and use his flame to light your way through a conflicting world of wonder and horror. Survive and outsmart the many monsters eager to devour your little friend’s flame as you experience five tales of fire and darkness, featuring an incredible cast of odd characters.

Marvel at every disturbing detail in a landscape painstakingly handcrafted with real life clay and animated in a stop motion style. Fully playable in both flatscreen and with a VR headset.

name: Tokimeki Memorial: Forever with You - Emotional
description: Sin descripción

name: Revenge of the Savage Planet
description: Revenge of the Savage Planet is an upbeat, satirical action adventure Sci-Fi. Jump, shoot and collect your way across vibrant alien worlds, uncovering new gear and upgrades, while discovering various hidden secrets.

name: Little Adventure Tale
description: Little Adventure tale is a Roguelike Deckbuilder set in a cute fantasy world where you can enlist the help of the Guild to Hire companions and manage several Card Decks & Accept Quests to earn more rewards! All this in order to banish the Evil Lord Obradin!

name: Hyperborea
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Eden
description:
An adrenaline-rush sci-fi FPS.
A HYPER UNIT ASKA is sent on a suicide mission to rescue citizens' COREs from MOEBIUS, an orbital city turned into a deadly trap. Dive into cybernetic warfare, face the ENGINEERS, and uncover the secrets of METAL EDEN.

name: Metal Eden
description:
An adrenaline-rush sci-fi FPS.
A HYPER UNIT ASKA is sent on a suicide mission to rescue citizens' COREs from MOEBIUS, an orbital city turned into a deadly trap. Dive into cybernetic warfare, face the ENGINEERS, and uncover the secrets of METAL EDEN.

name: Captain Blood
description:
Captain Blood is a pirate-themed action game set on the Spanish Main in the 17th century, where you step into the boots of a fearsome pirate on a quest for gold and glory. Expect wild adventures with cannon firing, pistol shooting, swashbuckling sword fights, and plenty of pirate shenanigans. This action-packed hack'n'slash features fierce hand-to-hand combat, hordes of enemies, and a classic fighting system with flashy combos and epic finishers.

The game underwent several iterations throughout the 2000s and was last showcased in 2010 before vanishing for years. Now, we are excited to bring it back, combining its original glory with a series of modern improvements for today's gamers.

name: Drop Duchy
description: Build your duchy piece by piece in this refreshing hybrid rogue-lite game. Use block-dropping mechanics to collect resources, recruit troops to fight against belligerent armies, and let every block shape your realm, leading your path to victory!

name: Tales of Grimace
description: Sin descripción

name: In Purr-Suit
description: Sin descripción

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Sogeumgang
description: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: 2weistein in Rongerland
description: Action Adventure and practicing maths basics: „2weistein“ combines lots of fun with a modern way of training maths. Often one also has to solve puzzles.

name: Suspense: Madman's Dreams
description: This psychological adventure, focused on narrative, is based on a scientific representation of mental disorders. Are you ready to face the fears of people suffering from mental illnesses? Use your voice as the voice of the main character to get as close to them as possible.

name: Mangút
description: Face the struggles of Gil, a tireless app delivery worker running against time to pay the bills. Swing across the platforms with a mechanical arm, dare to make tough decisions, and lead a revolution in Morro do Mangút.

name: Super Mario Orbit
description: Sin descripción

name: Shape of Dreams
description: Shape of Dreams is an action rogue-lite infused with MOBA-esque elements. Venture into a vivid dream world, and create your own champion by freely swapping skills with whatever you like. Play solo against all odds, or with friends in a 4-player co-op game.

name: WitchGhost
description: A spooky adventure through a weird and wonderful land. Boost your powers and change the world as you help Ezme, the WitchGhost, collect her memories so she can remeber how to go home.

name: Killa
description: Killa is a 3D adventure mystery with multiple endings. Valhalla, our protagonist, seeks the killer of her mentor, a mentor she treasures like family, venturing to an unknown island. Discover the culprit on this enigmatic island and embark on a journey of revenge.

name: ZeroSpace
description: ZeroSpace is a cinematic RTS with an epic sci-fi story where your decisions determine the fate of the galaxy. No two matches play the same thanks to nearly limitless combinations of factions, mercenary units and heroes, introducing unparalleled strategic depth and player expression to the genre.

name: Pandorex
description: Pandorex is a Point & Click Adventure featuring Harry who is on a mission to find his lost dog.

name: Despelote
description:
despelote is a first-person exploration game about the universal language of soccer and the ways it can bring people together, or push them apart.

Run, pass, and play with dozens of charming, hand-drawn characters in a unique world inspired by the street parks of Quito, Ecuador.

The game consists of three “days,” with each one taking place at a different phase in the player’s life. As you get older, so do the characters in the world around you. Your interactions with them, as well as your relationship to soccer itself, change dramatically with time.

name: Liminal Shroud
description: A psychological exploration experience that takes you deep into the heart of uncanny, in-between spaces where reality unravels. There are no monsters here—only the shadows of your own mind. Navigate strangely layered rooms, interact with the environment and unlock secrets to escape.

name: Skin Deep
description: Skin Deep is an immersive first-person shooter. We got sneezing. We got things getting stuck in your feet. Stalk through a vast non-linear starship and sneak, subvert, and sabotage to survive in this stellar sandbox. You're outnumbered, outgunned, and have no shoes. Welcome to Skin Deep!

name: Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War
description: PERESTROIKA - CONTINUATION OF OCTOBER Crisis... Crisis has caught up with the Motherland of the Revolution and lurks in its very heart - the Kremlin. Lead the country through the most difficult times. "Crisis in the Kremlin" opens up huge prospects for you.

name: Navigating the Labyrinth
description: Navigating the Labyrinth is a classic first-person party-based dungeon crawler RPG with grid-based movement and turn-based combat. Discover the secrets and riches of the labyrinths, and save your dying city.

name: Badlands Crew
description: Create, customize and command your battle wagon to conquer crazed enemy factions and save innocent survivors scattered throughout the lawless Badlands in the aftermath of a devastating apocalypse. Do you have what it takes to Build, Evolve and Fight to survive?

name: Tomb Raider Collection 2
description: The legend of Lara Croft continues on Evercade! Uncover an ancient Egyptian mystery and prevent the end of the world in Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation, and relive a series of Lara’s most noteworthy adventures from her past in Tomb Raider: Chronicles. Also includes a brand-new version of a special bonus level, previously only distributed for home computers.

name: Days Gone: Broken Road
description: Sin descripción

name: Days Gone Remastered
description:
Ride into a desperate, dog-eat-dog world in the definitive Days Gone experience, remastered for the PlayStation5 console.

Fight to survive an environment ravaged by a deadly pandemic as former outlaw biker, Deacon St. John. Risk the threats of the Broken Road on the back of your trusty Drifter bike as you face terrifying hordes of relentless feral Freakers – as well as dangerous gangs of humans.

name: Dreamy Syrup
description: "Sato Ama," whom you met by chance at university, is an ardent fan of the virtual idol "Amaha Shiroppu" just like you! The two hit it off and go out together, talk about their favorite idols, and gradually become closer. However... "I almost got found out." A certain comment made by Amaha Shiroppu during a stream raises a question: "Could it be that Amaha Shiroppu is... Sato Ama?" Will you witness the virtual idol "Amaha Shiroppu" being found out? A thrilling love comedy where "dreams" and "reality" intersect!

name: 100-in-1 Game Collection
description: Meet Magrat the witch, Harvey the weird fish, Stephanie the green cow and all their beloved friends, and embark on an epic journey through 100 arcade games that blend classic gameplay from your favorite retro titles with new concepts that are reinventing the arcade genre! Score as much as you can, then improve and challenge yourself to get all stars in solo or with your friends!

name: 100 in 1 Game Collection
description: Meet Magrat the witch, Harvey the weird fish, Stephanie the green cow and all their beloved friends, and embark on an epic journey through 100 arcade games that blend classic gameplay from your favorite retro titles with new concepts that are reinventing the arcade genre! Score as much as you can, then improve and challenge yourself to get all stars in solo or with your friends!

name: Knock on the Window
description: Sin descripción

name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 – Deluxe Edition
description: Get the ultimate Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 experience with the Deluxe Edition!

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Deluxe Edition
description:
After 26 years, FATAL FURY is back!

The DELUXE EDITION contains:
• Base game, DLC costume (Fatal Fury 2: Terry)
• SteelBook
• Artbook (100+ pages)
• OST (2 discs)
• Sticker sheets (X2)
• Poster (double-sided)
• Collector's box

name: Nekura na Classmate ga Ore no Ibukuro wo Tsukande Hanashite Kurenai
description: Sin descripción

name: TriggerHeart Exelica Enhanced
description: TriggerHeart EXELICA Enhanced adds additional elements to the original TriggerHeart EXELICA, including Faintear as a new playable character, an opening movie produced by P.A.WORKS with a theme song sung by Ayane, an “Enhanced” story mode with additional high-resolution CGs, balance adjustments to existing characters, handy features from the original game (Training Mode, leaderboards, vertical screen support), and more.

name: Bokura: Planet
description: "Back to the same planet, together... That's all I wanted..." BOKURA: planet is a two-player puzzle adventure that explores new possibilities in cooperative gaming. Players take on the role of the crew on a space exploration ship as they try to escape from a planet where they have crash-landed on.

name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
description: Lead the members of Expedition 33 on their quest to destroy the Paintress so that she can never paint death again. Explore a world of wonders inspired by Belle Époque France and battle unique enemies in this turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics.

name: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy
description:
A full remake of a 2001 point-and-click adventure game Amerzone which served as the first game in the later-created Syberia series.

The remake is more like a reimagining of an old classic adventure with new tough puzzles and new challenges.

name: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club: Tokimeki Roadmap to the Future
description: An upcoming visual novel based on Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club by Bushiroad Games.

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves
description: 26 years on, a brand-new entry in the Fatal Fury series is set to arrive on the scene! FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves features a unique art style that stimulates the senses and an innovative REV System that supercharges the excitement. Here, at long last, a new legend is about to unfold…

name: Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade
description: Slay the wicked in this gorgeous Japanese-style world of roguelite! Mastering the Demon Blades and fighting hordes of demons in the Edo period as Shigure the kunoichi. With each adventure, you will unravel the truth about her immortality.

name: Tempest Rising
description: Classic RTS action meets modern production and performance in Tempest Rising. Inspired by RTS greats of the 90s and 2000s, Tempest Rising is a classic, base-building real time strategy game set in a modern day alternative history war scenario. It features 3 unique factions, each with its own approach to combat and economy and offering a variety of strategies for players of all stripes, deep and rewarding gameplay that keeps a focus on strategy while rewarding skill, and built-in customization options that allow players to approach the game their way in both single player and multiplayer game modes.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.11 feat. V.W.P
description: Sin descripción

name: The Hundred Line: Last Defense Academy
description: A new adventure from the creators of the Danganronpa and Zero Escape series! 15 students are tasked with defending a school from grotesque monsters for 100 days. Can they make it to the end? And will they survive long enough to uncover the truth?

name: Maliki: Poison Of The Past
description: Join Maliki and her wacky family in their epic battle against Poison, a fearsome plant creature that has colonized space-time. Go along on a fantastic odyssey through the ages that provides a unique mix of exploration, temporal riddles and turn-based fights full of surprises.

name: Sedap! A Culinary Adventure
description: Sedap! A Culinary Adventure is a co-op cooking-combat adventure that combines the chaos of a collaborative kitchen and the wonders of adventuring into an unexplored world. Embark on an exciting culinary journey, whip up delectable delicacies, and serve your way through a fantastical reimagination of Southeast Asia!

name: Dumbot
description: Dumbot is a retro style hyper casual scrolling platformer game. Fluid and challenging gameplay designed to entertain. Amazing graphics, easy controls and two big worlds to explore providing you with many hours of fun playing time. Also no annoying in app purchases.

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Special Edition
description:
After 26 years, FATAL FURY is back!

Contents:
- Base game
- Season Pass 1
- DLC Character 1 (Scheduled for: Summer 2025)
- DLC Character 2 (Scheduled for: Summer 2025)
- DLC Character 3 (Scheduled for: Fall 2025)
- DLC Character 4 (Scheduled for: Winter 2025)
- DLC Character 5 (Scheduled for: Early 2026)

[Special Bonus]
- Pre-order Bonus
Early Access: 3 Days (Playable from April 21, 2025)

- DLC Costume: “FATAL FURY 2: TERRY”
* Digital Version: Bonus included if you purchase the game by April 23, 2025.
* Preorder costume bonus may be released as paid DLC in the future.

name: Lunar: Silver Star Story Complete
description: Remaster of the complete version of Lunar: Silver Star Story, released as part of the Lunar Remastered Collection bundle.

name: Lunar Remastered Collection
description: Embark on thrilling adventures within the enchanting worlds of LUNAR: Silver Star Story Complete and LUNAR 2: Eternal Blue Complete! These two cherished JRPGs have delighted gamers for generations. Now, in this definitive remastered edition, experience enhanced graphics, audio, and quality-of-life improvements that make the journey even more magical!

name: The Flayed Man
description: The Flayed Man is a short narrative-driven point and click horror game. Awaking without memories (or skin), you must uncover the sins of the past, pass judgement, and decide your fate in this macabre adventure.

name: Mandragora: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Includes:
Base Game
Deluxe Pet Follower
Deluxe Armor Transmog Set
Original Soundtrack
Digital Art Book

name: Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate
description: "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Ultimate" is a side-scrolling beat'em up with the heart of a fighting game, supporting cross-platform pixel art anime action with up to 8P online multiplayer and all the characters from "Phantom Breaker: Battle Grounds Overdrive"!

name: Tempopo
description: Tempopo is a contemplative puzzle game of planning and execution. Guide your Tempopo to rescue musical flowers across imaginative sky islands and arrange them in your own melodic garden. Take your time placing instructions and watch the harmonious or hilarious results of your decisions.

name: Wizdom Academy
description: Lead a wizard school in 3D, recruit students and staff, manage resources, and solve the mystery of severe mana droughts in Wizdom Academy. Engage in deep interactions with AI characters and thrive in this magical adventure !

name: Over Requiemz
description:
“Whatever pain awaits, I won’t regret this choice.”

A dark fantasy game about overcoming grief as you wander into the “Land of Oz.”

name: Rusty Rabbit
description: Millennia after humanity abandoned the planet, rabbits claimed their place... Stamp, a cute bunny with an old soul, pilots his trusty mech "Junkster" through the giant ruins of a frozen world in this 2.5D action belt scroller.

name: Scarred
description: Scarred is a first-person atmospheric horror puzzle game where you must uncover the truth about one of your schoolmates before it’s too late. Traverse a world of nightmares inspired by nostalgic Singaporean architecture as you fight to survive.

name: Polterguys
description: Polterguys is a fun-for-all-ages multiplayer game - a supernatural mix of whacky powerups and fast paced chases. The polterguys (ectoey little creatures) possess everyday objects to run around a quirky playlist of fantasy and real-world settings with a super-clear objective, which is to escape the Monster that is hunting them.

name: Bionic Bay
description: An ordinary man in an extraordinary world. Bionic Bay is a new kind of a 2D platformer. It introduces a unique Swap mechanic, allowing players to interact with the physics-based world in new ways. The immersive gameplay is completed by spectacular environments and creative level design.

name: Mandragora: Whispers of the Witch Tree
description: Mankind has surrendered the world to the monsters. People hide away behind walls of brick and palisades of ignorance, constructed by their leaders. Joy and delight are coveted jewels, out of reach of the masses. This is not the world you were promised. Travel by night and take it back. Journey through a world in decline, slowly falling prey to the damaging effects of Entropy. Fight against vicious enemies, challenge unique, deadly bosses, meet new allies, enemies, and every shade in-between, and make harsh moral choices. There are many paths worth taking. Choose yours.

name: Food Park Manager
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Rod Mayhem
description: Race against tiny troublemakers across dozens of crazy courses and take on unique and thrilling trials! Ride on single tracks, unleash powerful items against your rivals, or face off in exhilarating challenges to compete for the championships!

name: Lushfoil Photography Sim
description: An exploration/photography experience set across a vast selection of faithfully detailed landscapes.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy - Mythic Hunting Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy
description: 3X THE CONTENT OF ANY PREVIOUS BIG BUCK HUNTER CONSOLE OFFERING!

name: Electro Bop Boxing League
description: Climb the ranks and claim your spot among the greatest mechanical fighters in this Atompunk / Electro Swing themed auto-boxer! Outfit your boxer with a variety of parts, abilities, belts and crew upgrades earned through single matches or career mode!

name: Total Reload
description:
Ever had something turn out so disastrously that you wished you could just reset and start all over again? In this game you may just have the chance to reboot the grandest experiment ever gone wrong. That experiment? The Universe itself.

You will find yourself inside an amazing single mechanism, impressive in its scale. Taking control of its silent resident Artificial Intelligence named HAWKING, you will be able to visit many locations filled with a variety of technical devices.

Solve spatial puzzles, change the fundamental laws of physics to activate all systems of this incredible mechanism and launch a process called TOTAL RELOAD!

name: Hostile Dreams 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Overdrive: Deluxe Upgrade DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Overdrive: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Progress Orders
description:
is the guild where many adventurers meet.
Your unique story begins as you support your companions as the guild master!

name: Leo & Mia: Animal Rescue
description: Become a valiant animal rescuer as either Leo or Mia! Save wildlife in the savannah from poachers and other dangers in over 15 exciting missions!

name: Wind Fantasy: NeXus
description:
Wind Fantasy:NeXus is a TBS game.
In collaboration with 10 Taiwan's popular VTuber in depth into the cooperation, tailored to create a dedicated main storyline and permanent presence in the game, the player will be together with them in the world of wind fantasy, and the legendary heroes together to embark on an epic adventure

name: The Talos Principle: Reawakened
description: Step back into a world of thought-provoking puzzles, philosophical intrigue, and breathtaking visuals with The Talos Principle: Reawakened - a first-person puzzle masterpiece for both new players and long-time fans alike.

name: Star Overdrive
description: Use your powers to explore a massive world on your Hoverboard at lightning speed, face multitudes of enemies and epic bosses. Journey through four uniquely distinct biomes, each brimming with challenges and secrets to uncover.

name: All in Abyss: Judge the Fake
description: Asuha, a self-proclaimed gambling prodigy, challenges the Witch ruling the gambling district. Poised to win, she is defeated by a mysterious power. An adventure of gambling, exposing frauds and earning fortunes through poker.

name: Promise Mascot Agency
description: Explore the cursed town of Kaso-Machi! Recruit and train mascot friends! Help out when jobs go wrong! Solve the mystery of your exile! Help Pinky work through her many anger issues! Turn Promise Mascot Agency into the best agency in Japan! Go go, Michi and Pinky!

name: Snow Bros. 2 Special
description: Snow Bros. 2 Special is a remake of the 1994 arcade game Snow Bros. 2 by ToaPlan. It features new graphics, new stages, new game modes such as Time Attack, Survival, and Sky Run, and supports local and online multiplayer for up to four players. Players can also enjoy the original version of Snow Bros. 2, as the original score was one of the most popular requests from players.

name: Crashlands 2
description: Slap your way across a vibrant world where interstellar friendships are the key to your survival. Befriend eccentric aliens, craft bizarre weaponry, and stick it to the man in this sequel to the award-winning open world crafting RPG Crashlands.

name: Pilo and the Holobook
description: Join Pilo and Prof on a new space adventure! Use your Holobook to turn everything into stickers and create your encyclopedia of a new world. Explore new beautiful planets and meet new friends in this sweet adventure game.

name: Jumping Jazz Cats
description: Play, race and hang with your feline friends in this online platformer party game! Purrfect your pussycat parkour as you sprint, jump, bounce, swing, skid and slide through a collection of collaborative and competitive mini-games set in a grandiose cartoon mansion. Get jumpin', jazz cats!

name: Blue Prince
description: Welcome to Mt. Holly, where every dawn unveils a new mystery. Navigate through shifting corridors and ever-changing chambers in this genre-defying strategy puzzle adventure. But will the unpredictable path you create lead you to the rumored Room 46?

name: Descenders Next
description: Grab your board and master the mountain! Descenders Next is the ultimate extreme sports game, with sprawling snowy peaks, winding dirt tracks, and tons of parks to conquer. Will you and your friends become the Next Ultimate Descenders?

name: Commandos: Origins
description:
In 2019, Kalypso Media Group announced that a new 'Commandos' title was in development and last year it revealed that newly formed Claymore Game Studios was working on a next-generation installment in the Commandos strategy series.

Commandos: Origins tells the story of a newly founded British commando unit that grows into a brotherhood during its operations against strategic goals of the German Wehrmacht.

The player will control different characters with different abilities from an isometric perspective of the playing field and use them strategically in such a way that the given mission goal is achieved. So you will work your way through the various missions based on historical locations and missions to the respective goal.

name: In Search of Heroes!
description: Calling all Heroes! The age of knights is in its twilight, but the people still require your aid! Venture through various randomly-generated locales, complete quests and take down fearsome bosses. Return to your home estate to construct new buildings, equip powerful weapons, and rally new heroes!

name: Tiny Garden
description:
Tiny Garden, build your own magical garden inside a 90s toy
Plant your vegetables and trade them for furniture to customize tiny gardens in this delightful mix of farming, puzzle and strategy

name: South of Midnight
description: South of Midnight is a new action-adventure from Compulsion Games. Explore the mythos and confront mysterious creatures of the Deep South in this modern folktale while learning to weave an ancient power to surmount obstacles and face the pain haunting your hometown.

name: The Songbird Guild
description: The Songbird Guild is a Yuri RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about magical girls falling in love. Investigate the secrets of a corrupt fantasy world and fight creepy (yet somehow adorable?) monsters in turn-based battles, all to pay the bills in this world where being a magical girl is a regular 9-5 job.

name: Echoes of Eldoria
description: Sin descripción

name: Bot Hunter
description: Fast-paced roguelite shooter with modular weapons. Play as a vacuum cleaner bounty hunter. Use color theory to clean the galaxy of bot scum and collect rewards to pay your bills.

name: Bioid
description: The Space Library is a mess! Several dimensions intertwined with each other after the King of Thorns escaped from the Book of Worlds. Little Bit is rushing to help Owl-like turn the disorder into constant chaos!

name: Mirrored Soul
description: A turn-based RPG detective story with focus on monster-collecting, exploration, and humor. Negotiate with enemies to recruit them to your party, and fuse your monsters to create new ones.

name: Dragon Blazers
description: Dragon Blazers is a mix between 16bit arcade and Toriyama style. You are part of the Dragon Blazers, a team of powerful warriors mastering an ancient martial art technique with a dragon power, fighting against an evil cyber-ninja army that's ruining our beautiful world.

name: Gameday Mayhem!!
description: Sin descripción

name: Idiotic Dots
description: A person called Mr. Dot has assassinated the square president. He suffered the electric chair but after a deal with God he risen. Play as Mr. Dot and run around the weird town of Hammingham running away.

name: Holy Grain
description: Holy Grain is an absurd and hilarious roguelike, packed with tons of events, crazy battles, and one simple goal: blindly follow the counselor's orders. Your army's gonna have your back as you smash through those objectives, and the entity will always be there to protect you.

name: The Path of Ren
description: A 2D precision platformer set in an anime-inspired world between life and death. Those who lacked fulfillment in their lives arrive in this world when they die. Take on challenging, unique, and rewarding platforming challenges in a game that explores what it means to live a fulfilled life.

name: Isopod Keeping Simulator
description: Grow, feed and care for your colony of adorable isopods in this realistic semi-idle simulator. Watch your isopods multiply and split or sell your colony if they become too numerous. Created by the Kunstaat community, 100% of our proceeds support charity!

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - The Chapter of Markus
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball FX VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Korean Drone Flying Tour East River
description: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage!

name: South of Midnight: Premium Edition
description:
Immerse yourself into the macabre and fantastical world of South of Midnight with the Premium Edition, which includes the full game, up to 5 days early access, and digital access (in English) to:
• South of Midnight Artbook
• Original Soundtrack composed by Olivier Deriviere
• The Boo-Hag Comic book by Rob Guillory
• Music Video: Songs & Tales of South of Midnight
• Documentary: Weaving Hazel’s Journey, Director’s Cut

name: Toni Island Adventure
description: Toni, a pizza-loving sailor dog, shipwrecks on a mysterious island. Solve challenging puzzles, defeat foes, unlock minigames, unravel the island's ancient magic to find your way back home, and don't forget to take a break for a hot slice of pizza!

name: Detective Dotson
description: Chase down criminals, spy on bad guys and solve cases! Change into a disguise or recruit a team member - your choices matter! Enjoy multi-genre gameplay and watch thrilling episodes. Games and stories from the endlessly intriguing modern day India!

name: Sorting Inc
description: A casual and relaxing game about sorting various items. Join Sorting Inc and climb up through the departments to become the absolute expert in the field of sorting.

name: Zirquitz
description: ZIRQUITZ is a chill yet deep graph-building game. Build and optimize an evolving graph of nodes to produce “Work,” your resource for upgrades and expansion. Discover synergy, power up your network, and unlock endless potential!

name: Liminal Department
description: Trapped in what seems to be an endless hospital department. Carefully observe your surroundings in each loop to escape the Liminal Department

name: Hotel Tales
description: Sin descripción

name: TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortitude Tower Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Collapsed Horizon
description: Sin descripción

name: Leafing Home
description: Leafing Home is a cozy adventure game where you play as a small squirrel on a quest to retrieve the World Tree’s stolen fruit and find your way back home. Explore a vibrant world filled with quirky characters, and help restore nature to its former glory. Master unique flight mechanics, tackle aerial challenges, solve puzzles, and dive into a variety of fun mini-games. This heartwarming tale of belonging and environmentalism is perfect for players of all ages.

name: Green Thing from the Planet Jupiter
description: Sin descripción

name: The Electrifying Incident: A Monster Mini-Expedition
description: An adorable bite-sized adventure from the creators of A Monster’s Expedition - explore the facility, avoid the live electricity, and repair the malfunctioning reactor.

name: Motorcycle Night Ride
description: Sin descripción

name: Progress Racer RPG
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Tourist
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Outpost Sigma
description: Sigma Prime is running out of resources! We have to venture into space and mine as much ore as we can for the home planet. Can you survive the harsh environment of an asteroid field? Use probes to discover the sector. Pilot mining ships or direct mining drones to mine ore from asteroids that fly by. Protect Outpost Sigma from collisions using shields. Buy from trading ships. Transports will come to take the much needed ore back to Sigma Prime. If the situation goes bad, you must escape! Good Luck. This is a single-player 2D top-down pixel game with space physics. Random generation makes every run unique. If you ever want to just mine some asteroids while trying to survive the harshness of space, this is the game for you.

name: Death Kid
description: Sin descripción

name: Veloria: The Knot of Candles
description: Sin descripción

name: Dave the Diver: Ichiban's Holiday
description: Dave the Diver: Ichiban's Holiday is a DLC that adds content themed around the Like a Dragon franchise.

name: Rolling Star
description: Bursting with hilarious dialogue and comical encounters! The second installment of the super-exhilarating Metroidvania series is here!!

name: Space Battle
description: Pilot your ship through dangerous space and defend against relentless imperial attacks in Space Battle, a high-intensity round-based strategy game.

name: Shadows Of Wyrmwood
description: Shadows of Wyrmwood is a roguelike adventure RPG. Use spells, swords, and strategy to defeat every corrupted foe. Travel across four procedurally generated maps that grow harder with every encounter. With each victory, you obtain new armor, weapons, and spells from defeated enemies.

name: Cataclysm Wars
description: The Empire is under attack, and only its mighty armies can save it! Shame you aren't in charge of those, then. Lead an outmatched militia through overwhelming odds in this turn-based strategy game, and save your nation from collapse. Or, lead the dogged Syrinx foe and crush the Empire!

name: Arch Wizard
description: Fast paced "Hyper Shooter" complemented with esoteric exploration experience. Take a quest to become Arch Wizard: dominate surrounding realms, reverse Time, escape Death, befriend Chaos, face the End of the World. Knowledge based progression. High scores. Full of secrets.

name: Kitchen Wars
description: Kitchen Wars is a fast-paced party game with 2-8 players that plunge players into the chaos of a restaurant, where they must engage in strategic fights and theft while catering to their clients.

name: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage - Tape 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Bang Bang Barrage
description: Survive the treacherous sea in this quirky top-down roguelike shooter! Play solo or team up and fight off Cthulhu's minions. Master a unique recoil-based mechanic to blast enemies and chart your course. Mix and match upgrades to craft the perfect sea-surviving strategy!

name: Nekopara After: La Vraie Familie
description: Sin descripción

name: Koira
description: Save a puppy and embark on a musical, hand-drawn adventure. Journey together to the heart of a magical forest. Run from danger and discover your powers.

name: Idle Waters
description: A relaxing idle fishing game that waits for you at the bottom of the screen while you do other things. CATCH, COLLECT and DISPLAY fishes!

name: Hidden Cat Outlaws
description: Funny hidden object game. Become a sheriff and find all the cats wanted in the Wild West. Relax and laugh as you catch naughty cats!

name: Nif Nif
description: Get ready for a gooey good time in this roguelike deckbuilding adventure with Nif Nif, the piglet who's saving the forest one sparkly animal at a time!

name: Oni Hunters
description: Journey through Gironia's lands, where monsters roam and secrets await. Battle, fuse creatures, and decide your fate in the grand Monster Jubilee. Ready for the adventure?

name: Galactic Warship
description: I always wanted to play a game where I could take direct control of a capital ship in 3D space. When I couldn't find that game, I decided to make it. As a solo developer I spent two years crafting Galactic Warship - letting you pilot massive capital warships in full 3D with complete 6-axis freedom.

name: Underquest
description: Cute fantasy roguelite with backpack mechanics. Combine items to create powerful skills and use them in fast-paced combat. Explore randomly generated dungeons in the Underkingdom and discover the secrets of its inhabitants!

name: Wizabeasts
description: Wizabeasts is a monster-taming RPG with tactical battles! Uncover a mystery from the past, take down a dangerous gang, and get your student debt forgiven by defeating club champions!

name: Dungellion
description: Rogue-lite with elements of Battle Royale and Action-RPG. Fight in randomly generated dungeons and find a lot of unique abilities! Become the only one who survived and go to the next stage along with the winners of other arenas. How long can you survive?

name: Little Wings Deliveries
description: Embark on a playful adventure with your cozy flying ship. Traverse through floating islands, chat with new friends, and make deliveries. Plan out your routes and find secrets while enjoying the beautiful landscape. As your lungs are filled with air, connect with yourself and discover your compass.

name: Game (not) Over
description: GAME (not) OVER is a survivors-like with deck-building elements, blending both genres to offer a fresh game. Lost in the world of video games, use cards to summon hero allies, and defend yourself from the hordes of villains who want to claim their revenge on you!

name: One Million Stars
description: Get stars, avoid monsters. The rules are simple, but the goal massive. Pilot 4 different ships, choose stackable upgrades, and grab wild powerups in an endless, dynamically generated roguelite arcade space adventure. Take each run as far as you can, banking progress on the road to ONE MILLION STARS.

name: Necroflora
description: A new evil has taken root - you. Become an ever-growing many-headed hydra. Feed upon your enemies, acquire powerful mutations and defeat the 4 kings and their armies.

name: Eternal Glory
description: Sin descripción

name: Dana Cipher: Dead Man's Hand
description: Sin descripción

name: RoboSamurai
description: Sin descripción

name: Clean Stack
description: Sin descripción

name: A Short Death
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket Boots Mania: Space Train
description: Sin descripción

name: Forklift Driving Simulator VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Delta Vector
description: Sin descripción

name: Noobs Are Coming
description: YOU ARE THE FINAL BOSS. Brutal synergy arena roguelike. Pick your Final Boss character, equip boss patterns and combine tons of attacks to create unique builds. Play solo or in co-op!

name: Hillbilly Hellfire
description: Defend a holy relic in this third-person tower defense repelling waves of hellspawn using divine intervention and a bit of hillbilly ingenuity. Charge headfirst into fierce battles, outsmarting twisted foes with quick decisions, explosive turrets, and precision gunplay as you claim victory!

name: Seeking Adventure
description:
A 2d, search and find adventure RPG about clicking things and finding stuff. Adventure through a map of hand crafted levels helping villagers, overcoming challenges and looting chests to find your place in this medieval fantasy world.

The game blends dice rolling mechanics with hidden object and point and click adventure games to bring a unique blend of genre to the table.

name: Toggle Tile
description:
Toggle Tile is a puzzle game that has you changing the color of tiles in a 3 by 3 grid.
The goal is to change the color of all the tiles. Each tile has a 3 by 3 grid of icons inside it.
Each icon acts on the corresponding tile in the puzzle. Click on a tile to apply all its effects at once.

name: The Lightkeeper is Gone
description: Sin descripción

name: Patient 001
description: Sin descripción

name: Festered
description: Brave the terrors of a contaminated research facility, where every step could be your last. PSX style survival horror game.

name: Zexion
description: Seek out new weapons and equipment to delve deeper into the dangerous world of Cypher-X72! Be warned, you aren't the only one seeking the forbidden technology known as Zexion! It will take cunning and valor to succeed in this action-packed sci-fi adventure!

name: Eldritch Escape
description:
In this roguelike bullet-heaven, Earth has been consumed by an ancient eldritch god. Form a customizable squad of survivors and explore decaying, metroidvania-inspired worlds trapped within the god’s belly. Battle endless waves of nightmarish creatures, extract resources, rescue survivors, uncover forbidden knowledge, and search for a way out.

Portals powered by ancient eldritch forces link worlds and realities, forming a tangled web. With a limited oxygen supply, your squad has just 20 minutes to navigate the portal network, jumping from world to world in search of the one escape route. Can you escape the void in time?

name: Gigacrab: Getting Over The Meme
description: Reach the top of the world using only your muscular claws. Every fall will test your patience. Can you make it?

name: Star Crew
description: Star Crew is a 1-8 player co-op sci-fi roguelite. Maintain subsystems, fend off enemies, and stay alive long enough for evac to arrive. Powerful upgrade choices, procedurally-generated ships, and permanent progression. Survive with friends or handle things all by yourself.

name: Ma vie en rogue
description: Ma vie en rogue is a roguelike spanning multiple themed dungeons and worlds bringing advancements such as a mini-map, first-person view, and paperdoll customization to the genre.

name: Tayutama: Kiss on my Deity
description:
The visual novel Tayutama: Kiss on my Deity makes its return with a remastered edition, launching on Nintendo Switch and Steam in spring 2025 with a simultaneous worldwide release.

First released for PC in July 2008, the game quickly captured fans’ hearts, inspiring an anime adaptation in 2009.

This updated edition, supervised by Lump of Sugar, has been reimagined as an all-ages experience, partially remastered in high-definition, and localized into multiple languages.

The story follows protagonist Yuri Mito, the only son of the local priest at Yachimata Shrine. After a series of events during spring break, Yuri meets Kikuramikami no Hime, the guardian of a mystical relic in the woods near his school. She explains the strained history between humans and the Tayutai, a mythical race sealed within the relic due to their potential threat to humanity. To bridge the gap between their worlds, the goddess reincarnates as a young girl named Mashiro and entrusts herself to Yuri. However, the relic is accidentally destroyed, releasing the Tayutai. Particularly dangerous are the “Three Mightiest,” powerful entities hostile toward humans.

Armed with spirit powers unique to his lineage, Yuri teams up with Mashiro and three other heroines to explore whether humans and Tayutai can coexist peacefully. This romantic fantasy adventure tells a heartfelt tale of growth, connection, and the mysteries of love.

name: The Fool's Apprentice
description: A wizard academy management sim where you—an obviously benevolent professor—must manage & cast spells on your many apprentices so that they might study the right spells… and perhaps even survive the researching process. Some may die, but oh well, can’t save them all!

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero DLC 2
description:
Introducing SEASON PASS DLC 2 playable characters from Dragon Ball DAIMA, coming soon to DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO.

Vegeta (Mini), Glorio & more...

name: Tower Dominion
description: In this roguelike tower defense, repel waves of enemies by shaping the paths, customizing your defense and adapting your strategy to crush the invading swarms. No two playthroughs are the same and each strategic decision in this treacherous world could lead to survival or utter defeat.

name: Black Mesa: Military
description: Experience the consequences of the resonance cascade scenario once again, and play as one of Hazardous Environments Combat Unit marines, Steven Mills.
