You are not a survivor, you are sent on a mission. Secure Black Mesa Research Facility with the rest of your squad and eliminate any hostile forces. This mod is not a recreation of any existing mods. It's my own creation and all maps and plot are being developed by me. You will experience Black Mesa disaster from a perspective of the villains and even see Gordon Freeman in person.

name: Booze & Ooze
description: In this deckbuilder and tavern management simulation featuring RPG and roguelite elements, you play a destitute leprechaun trying to claw his way back to fortune and power from behind the counter of a derelict inn. You are no hero material, but unfortunately for you, your clients are!

name: Feudal Bros
description: Japan. Edo period. After many years of violent wars, peace has returned to the land, but it doesn’t seem like it will last for long. A new danger lurks in the shadows, and only two noblemen can stop it: Lord Baka, a Japanese feudal lord, and Prince Bouffon, a prince from the faraway land of France.

name: Shattered Time
description: Step into the chaotic world of Shattered Time, a 2.5D platformer set within the mysterious confines of a high-tech laboratory. As a lone experiment gone awry, you gain the ability to manipulate time itself, allowing you to reverse moments in the environment and use the past to reshape the present.

name: Malevolent Madness
description: Malevolent Madness invites players into a tension-filled horror adventure, offering an experience rich in mystery and puzzles. A mysterious time machine unleashes extraordinary powers that could disrupt the balance between universes, but this discovery becomes a significant threat to humanity in the wrong hands.

name: Metrogether
description: Metrogether is a train simulator where you drive, collect passengers, work together with friends and explore the subway network in a fictional city. Embark on your journey as a train driver or ticket inspector in single and multiplayer.

name: Bricksbumpbump
description: bricksbumpbump is a local multiplayer party game (supporting up to 4 players). In the game, you need to control your character to move and stack blocks like building with toy bricks to achieve the game objectives. The first one to meet the objective wins the game.

name: Mac & Jack: Candy Bashers
description:
Mac & Jack: Candy Bashers is a hi-score chasing roguelite following the adventures of a Pumpkin and their loyal friend.

Brave the Halloween night and work to survive against waves of monsters while collecting as much candy as you can! Discover new items by Trick-or-Treating between waves, purchase them from the shopkeeper for permanent use, and build a loadout that customizes the difficulty of every run!

name: Masks of the Void
description: Masks of the Void is a Rogue-lite action-RPG where you use powerful masks that grant you unique powers. Player's can level up their skills and swap them out for better ones as their journey continues.

name: 100 Dogs in India
description: Find 100 dogs in India! A simple hidden object game made with Kivy. Do you recognize the real-life buildings in the background?

name: Snakeloop
description: Snakeloop is a challenging puzzle game based on a simple idea: What if you took classic Snake but inverted the goal and made it so you have to form a loop by eating your own tail.

name: Proud Dad Simulator
description: Have you ever wondered what it feels like to have a proud and supportive dad? Proud Dad Simulator gives you the loving father you wish you had growing up! Simply click dad to receive an affirmation, or delve deeper to explore all 10 minigames and collect all achievements.

name: End's Reach
description: End's Reach is a 3D Exploration Action Adventure Game that focuses on a character lost in the depths of space. Players will solve puzzles, collect upgrades, items, weapons and even magical abilities as they uncover the mysteries of this strange new world. A classic tale of technology taken too far.

name: Crony Corp
description: Master Crony — it’s up to you to buy, craft, strategize, manufacture, and hijack to outperform your rivals and build your empire. In this competitive business builder game, your choices shape the live market. Seize every opportunity to dominate…or get demoted!

name: PBJ: The Musical
description:
Imagine Romeo and Juliet… but it’s Peanut Butter and Jelly? This handcrafted musical game tells the badly researched story of the iconic sandwich’s tragic origins.
Join peanut boy and strawberry girl on their journey across animated paper landscapes, to the music from famous Crumble Lady Lorraine Bowen – and unlock spinoff remixes from different artists!

name: Kraino Rebirth
description: Sin descripción

name: Do Not Press The Button (To Delete The Multiverse)
description: In this game, you can do anything except press the BIG RED BUTTON. Enjoy various activities and find creative ways to not press the button. Don't press the button! Do you understand? Inspired by games like The Stanley Parable and Title_Pending.

name: Sheol Inferno
description:
Sheol is a roguelike card game based on Dante's Divine Comedy.

You will accompany Dante on his journey through the 9 circles of Hell and fight alongside him to defeat the guardians of the circles.

Use the cards from the Spanish deck or Poker deck to complete the missions that will be assigned to you in each circle and thus be able to access the next one.

During the game you will earn gold that will allow you to obtain Blessings to help you on your adventure and, at the end of the game, you will be able to improve your skills on your character sheet.

FEATURES:
- Card roguelike.
- Spanish deck of cards or Poker deck.
- Character progression.
- Deck Management.
- Based on the lore of the Divine Comedy.
- Highly replayable.
- NO micro transactions.

name: Conquest Dark
description: Experience an ARPG's rapid ascension to power in minutes, packed with savage, survivors-like action and devastating sword & sorcery combat. Perfect your builds through Dark Ritual runs that will decide humanity's future as you battle endless hordes across haunting ruins and cursed kingdoms.

name: Heroes of the Seven Islands
description: A party-based RPG with turn-based combat. Heroes of the Seven Islands is a comfy yet challenging adventure with side quests in a vast fairytale world, inspired by 90s games.

name: Wildkeepers Rising
description: Tame monsters! Slay waves of enemy hordes! Explore fantasy lands! Wildkeepers Rising is a whimsical action-RPG roguelite set in a beautiful hand-drawn world that combines the power curve of bullet heaven games with the compulsive fun of a creature collector.

name: Ogora
description: Ogora is a fantasy roguelike deck-builder where you will craft powerful decks, cast unwieldy spells, and blow up your own path through a procedurally generated dungeon. Adorn yourself with hidden trinkets and try to survive!

name: Hellbreak
description: Fight to save your soul from damnation in a brutal arena where only the strongest survive. Entertain the Lords of Hell and earn their favor to unlock new weapons, spells, and blessings. Dive into this fast-paced roguelite arena shooter and achieve the highest score. Can you reclaim your soul?

name: SpreadCheat
description: SpreadCheat is a puzzle game that fuses intricate spreadsheet challenges with a comedic, 90s financial vibe in a retro Windows 3.11 setting. The Player takes on the role of the new office prodigy, solving absurd tasks and manipulating spreadsheet cells to hit specific targets using clever formulas.

name: Crowpoint Manor
description: Step inside Crowpoint Manor, where every guest harbours a dark secret. As an undercover detective, you’ll solve bizarre puzzles, navigate dangerous traps, and witness hilariously tragic accidents.

name: Frogmageddon
description:
Fight hordes of the evil snake army as one, several, dozens, hundreds of frogs, each with unique abilities and quirks. Frogmageddon is a bullet hell survival game where you flip the script of survival gameplay and become the horde yourself! Can you make it to 100 frogs and defeat the evil tyranny of King Snek?

Initially made for the GMTK 2024 Game Jam, the Steam version includes controller support, achievements, new game modes, new frogs, and much more!

name: Kaamos
description: Kaamos is a bite-sized turn-based puzzle roguelike where battles are fought by matching tiles on a grid with looping rows and columns. Build your character and deck of tiles by looting equipment from your foes. Traverse a dark medieval world where the Sun went down and never rose again.

name: TCG Multiplayer Card Shop Simulator
description: Multiplayer TCG Card Shop Simulator game. Dive into the world of multiplayer gaming by opening your own local game store! Stock your shelves with the latest booster packs, or crack them open to collect the cards yourself.

name: These Darker Tides
description: Welcome [EMPLOYEE] to your new job protecting Deep Sea Cables from creatures of the deep. We're not liable for loss of limbs, sanity, or life while on the job. Don't forget to keep your desk clean and your eyes on those cameras!

name: Nightmare Shift
description: Nightmare Shift is a psychological horror game that follows a female protagonist who starts a new job as a motel receptionist, only to find her life spiraling into a dark and mysterious reality. As she questions her sanity, she must uncover the truth behind the eerie and abnormal events around her.

name: Mayo Mayo
description: Discover Mayo Mayo, a Match-4 game where strategy and agility are key. Chain clever combos, solve captivating puzzles, and break records. Challenge your friends or improve your skills solo in this competitive adventure full of surprises.

name: Jupiter Hell Classic
description: Jupiter Hell Classic is the demake of a remake of a roguelike unmake of a famous 1993 FPS shooter. Rip and Tear!

name: Hotel Owner Simulator
description: Hotel Owner Simulator is a hotel management game where you start from a small hotel and grow your business by creating beautifully designed rooms, adjusting room sizes and layouts by placing each individual wall, negotiating high prices, and expanding your empire. Lets build, and manage the resort.

name: Effulgence
description: Explore a mysterious world brought to life through text symbols.

name: Tamagotchi Nano Colorful Hololive Fantasitchi
description: The Tamagotchi Nano Colorful Hololive Fantasitchi (Tamagotchi Nano Colorful ホロライブファンタジっち) is the second release in the Tamagotchi Nano Colorful line. It is made in collaboration with the 3rd generation of VTubers under Hololive Production, named Hololive Fantasy.

name: HackHub
description: Unravel cyber secrets and foil mass surveillance as a skilled hacker in Hackhub. Challenge authority, rewrite the rules, and emerge as the ultimate digital rebel.

name: Treasure 'n Trio
description: Team up with a brute-force warrior, a nimble and wily thief, and a cowardly wizard with teleportation magic. Use all three characters with different abilities at the right time to solve puzzles and collect treasures.

name: Escape from Mutation Station
description: A short, unconventional escape room experience. You are the candidate. You must find a way out of this room. Things are not as they seem.

name: Deck of Haunts
description: Deck of Haunts invites you to become a malevolent Haunted House. Lure humans into your cursed halls, manipulate their fears, and drain their essence to grow your power. Use strategy to build your mansion and expand your dark influence, turning your home into a terrifying, inescapable nightmare.

name: Jeepney Stories
description: Jeepney Stories is a heartwarming, slice-of-life, funny and chill visual novel about family, chances, getting old and living in the third world.

name: Disaster Blaster
description: Disaster Blaster is a roguelite card game where you play as a mad scientist using a powerful simulator to engineer the most devastating weapon in the universe.

name: Lovish
description: Lovish is an outrageous 8-bit action-adventure game! Quest with Sir Solomon through a series of bite-sized rooms, as he attempts to free Princess Tsuna, the woman he loves, from the Devil Lord's clutches!

name: Bonaparte: A Mechanized Revolution
description: 1789, Paris. Take Napoleon’s place in an alternate history as Céline or César Bonaparte in this ideology driven, turn-based strategy journey. Defend, reform or oppose the monarchy and write your own alternative history by combining cunning political skills and tactical military prowess.

name: I Want to Believe
description: I Want to Believe is a first-person action game with elements of detective work, simulation, stealth, freedom of action, and driving.

name: Bar Night VR
description: Mix. Serve. Restock. Fill. Repeat. Bar Night VR is a VR bartender experience where you manage a bar, being responsible for serving customers, restocking drinks, filling machines, and more. Progress through the nights and master the bartender experience!

name: Door4: Ultimatum
description: Dive into the captivating world of puzzles with the new part of the Door game series. Your task is to find the correct door among many options to advance to the next level. But be careful: only by understanding the patterns and solving puzzles you can unlock the coveted passage.

name: Nebelmer
description: Discover the unknown land of Nebelmer, a small open world game about exploration, movements and mysteries. Leave your village to uncover the wonders and secrets hidden beneath the mist.

name: Hexaroma: Village Builder
description: HEXAROMA is a strategy based charming little island village builder. Dive into a relaxing yet challenging experience where you strategize the best hexagon island placements in this cute little city builder game. Place the building pieces strategically, grow your village and your tiny island.

name: War Mechanic
description: "War Mechanic" is a unique first-person simulator set in a dieselpunk world where World War II never ended. Manage a military base, explore with your combat vehicle, and survive in a world driven by war and money.

name: Little Fighter 2 Remastered
description: Rediscover the classic combat charm of "Little Fighter 2," now with fully upgraded and redrawn graphics, support for local connections up to 8 computers, and every character move more detailed and extravagant, providing an unprecedented combat experience.

name: Teeny Tiny Harbors
description: Sin descripción

name: Freckles
description: These are cute little creatures that come from the planet Mercury. On a mission to earth to the united nations, the freckles are challenged with the earth's space junk. While flying there spaceship they accidently crash into a fridge, crashing in the backyard of a greedy family named Maus.

name: Jumfrog
description: Leap to Freedom! Guide a frog prince on an epic journey out of a deep, dark well in this challenging platformer. Every jump counts as you slingshot the frog with precision through tough obstacles. Can you conquer the fear of failure and find the light at the top?

name: Pieces of me
description: Pieces of me is a psychological thriller drama in the genre of "walking simulator", which is a spin-off to the game "September 7th"

name: Three Skies Ascension
description: A turn based, story driven, strategic RPG with challenging dungeons and hundreds of heroes and creatures to collect and customize.

name: Mirage: Ignis Fatuus
description: As the world turns short of Mana, Mirage, the city of illusions, is in danger of collapsing! Help Kyuboy’d make his way through mind-boggling puzzles to save his hometown!

name: Voice of Belldona
description: Voice of Belldona weaves a story of swords, magic, and sci-fi! The game features roguelike decks, turn-based combat, JRPG elements, and customizable builds. Choose a character and combat style, explore randomly generated maps, power up your team, crush your enemies and... interact with a cute loli?

name: Kill The Dream
description: Kill The Dream is a survival horror game that combines brutal grid-based combat with first person exploration. Search the town of Frozen Pines, where survivors and monsters alike have been warped by the twisted presence in the lake. Hack your way through, end the nightmare, kill the dream.

name: Shadow Leap
description: In the world of the night, the protagonist who has the power to manipulate "shadows" performs exhilarating actions to "leap" around and, together with his shadow clone, defeats his enemies. Shadow Clone Action game.

name: Fear the Timeloop
description: Fear The Timeloop is a survival horror game where every fifteen minutes, the protagonist dies and resets to the starting point. Can you break the cycle and escape the loop?

name: Midnight Swamp
description: A grim point-and-click adventure where you dive into a world of dark fairy tales. Play as a tourist who must find a way out of the mysterious Midnight Swamp.

name: The Red Bell’s Lament
description: A dark fantasy about two worlds, human and demon, where vampire hunters who had fought alone now fight with the world's fate at stake.

name: Langort
description: Langort is a roguelite deck-building hack-and-slash where you are a swashbuckling hero on a quest to defeat the Lich Queen. Fight endless hordes of undead, growing more powerful with every kill.

name: Countess in Crimson: The Black Dawn
description: The Black Dawn DLC adds 3 new romance options into the game

name: Sultan's Game
description: Sultan's Game is a card-based simulation and narrative game, inspired by The One Thousand and One Nights. You are one of the ministers of the mighty Sultan, a fickle, cruel king that treats his subject like pawns of a deadly game for his own pleasure. Forced to make dreadful choices to save your own life, you will have to find a way to survive not just the Sultan’s Game, but its consequences too.

name: Dread Tomb
description: Dread Tomb is a multiplayer cooperative horror game based on Chinese folk rumors. You will face a rugged random map environment and terrain construction, adventure in various harsh random weather conditions, and discover a variety of thrilling mechanisms and mysterious monsters waiting for you.

name: Bullet Noir
description: In the vengeance business, you leave no loose ends. Four characters scour the city, searching for their mentor's murderer in a brutal ballet of bullets. Stylish neo-noir top-down shooter with one-hit-one-kill mechanics.

name: Gold Gold Adventure Gold
description: Gold makes god. Embrace city-building chaos. Pet giant monsters! Watch puny adventurers! Bend nature to your will with powerful spells and the greatest of all forces of nature - GOLD. Colony sim / reverse RPG

name: Card of Legend: Awaken Angels
description:
Angels, Cards, Battle! Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces!
A fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.

Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces! A competitive Anime TCG game featuring fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.This game features PvP, PvE, Roguelike, Single Player Missions, and others. Play your cards right!

name: Possible One: Lunar Industries
description: Possible One is the ultimate colony management game set in space, and the only space-related RTS game based on proven or very feasible technologies, avoiding sci-fi.

name: Croc: Legend of the Gobbos
description:
Argonaut Games, the legendary studio known for bringing its pioneering 3D technology to a 2D gaming world in the 1980s, has returned after a 20 year hiatus. It became a household name to gamers worldwide by developing groundbreaking titles, including the classics Starglider and Starglider 2, the seminal Star Fox (in collaboration with Nintendo), and Croc Legend of the Gobbos.

The reborn Argonaut Games continues the legacy established by Jez San OBE in 1982, now as a boutique publisher driven by creativity and developer collaboration. Possessing a catalog of classic gaming IP combined with a roadmap of original games, we hope you will join us as we embark on this exciting new chapter in Argonaut’s history.

Additionally, retro-gaming fans will be excited to know that the remaster includes the Crocipedia, an extensive and meticulously curated digital museum containing long-lost development assets, such as game design documents, concept art, animation tests, team member interviews, and much more.

name: Ignition Arena
description: Ignition Arena is a competitive space combat game where players build and customize their own starships to engage in intense PvP battles. Set in a futuristic arena, the game emphasizes strategic shipbuilding and fast-paced combat. Players can choose from a wide array of ship components, including weapons, armor, and equipment, to create their ideal battle-ready vessel. With a focus on skill-based gameplay, Ignition Arena offers a dynamic multiplayer experience where tactics and customization are key to victory.

name: Pip My Dice
description: Pip My Dice is a Yahtzee Roguelike experience. Score enough to make it to the next round, customize your dice to score more and collect relics to create game-breaking combos. Climb the leaderboards and enjoy a different run every time!

name: Elevator Down
description: Judge the Fate of the Dead in this satirical, bureaucratic, decision-making game. Talk to Souls, check their documents, reference Holy Texts and decide if they're going Up or Down. Follow the Rules or trust your own moral compass and see where your choices take you - hopefully not the Elevator Down.

name: Whisper of the House
description: What's happening in this seemingly peaceful town? Strange residents, bizarre incidents, and unexpected storylines! Please be sure to let go of all your human lifestyle preferences and strive to meet the special requests of your otherworldly employers. Decorate this house with peculiar furniture!

name: Whispers of The Shadow
description: Detective Grace Lawson sets out immediately upon receiving a tip about her missing stepsister Amy, and when she gets there, she suddenly finds herself trapped inside the house. Now, Grace has only one goal: to find her missing sister and escape this nightmare.

name: Otherskin
description: Join Alex on her deadly solo-mission to expose the mysteries of planet Vandermire. Experience a truly transformative third-person shooter and absorb organic abilities to expand your combat and movement capabilities beyond anything you’ve seen before.

name: The First Settlement VR
description: Immerse yourself in "The First Settlement VR," a medieval city-building simulation. Construct unique buildings, manage production chains, and trade with neighboring towns. Experience the evolving economy and culture through your strategic decisions. Witness the impact of your actions in VR.

name: Ninja Clan
description: Ninja Clan is a Strategy narrative-driven game. Guide your ninja clan from inception to its rise or downfall. Train ninjas, complete missions, and make crucial decisions that will shape the fate of your clan and its legacy...

name: Barbarization
description: Barbarization is a roguelite dungeon crawler with elements of bullet hell, deck building and strategy. Civilization fell to the dark legions now swarming this land. From the ruins of what is left, unlikely heroes emerge to reclaim it from the scourge.

name: My Dear Love
description: Heartful and wholesome stat-raiser otome game with a cooking mini game! Help take care of Katsuya, the adorable little nephew of your crush!

name: Screaming Savage Blood Death
description: Take charge as freshly-hired camp counselors and rescue campers from natural nasties, supernatural spooks, as well as a mysterious maniac in a retro side-scrolling survival-horror adventure set in the wetlands of New Jersey. Can you uncover the dark secrets lurking within the Pine Barrens?

name: The Rewinder 2
description: The Rewinder 2 is an action adventure game inspired by eastern mythology. Explore cursed villages, dungeons. Unlock new skills and meet all sorts of ghosts and monsters.

name: The Guilty Hearts
description: Seoyeon Yu, a former police officer, works as a private investigator for a rich family. However, during her investigation, she discovers evidence linking them to her husband's death. Using her ability to see people's guilt, she begins an investigation to solve the mystery.

name: Metro Gravity
description: Explore, fight, solve puzzles and bend gravity to escape the dream-like world of the Halls! Metro Gravity is a mind-boggling musical adventure with rhythmic combat and compelling lore.

name: King's Gambit
description: King's Gambit is a Cooperative Dungeon Crawler Roguelite inspired by Chess! Every run offers a fresh strategic challenge as you build and customize your buffs and abilities card deck. Choose from several playable characters, weapons and spells and embark on a solo or co-op turn-based adventure!

name: CuckTales
description: CuckTales is a 2D Hand-Drawn Adult Visual Novel that takes you on an emotional and thrilling adventure. Explore the provocative world of the Cuckold/NTR fetish with a fresh twist, enriched by carefully curated bisexual moments and define your path to become the ultimate boyfriend.

name: Card Summoner
description: Card Summoner is a CCG, where you journey to various villages and engage in local clan tournaments to elevate your rank. Duel villagers and collect unique cards while fulfilling your summoner duties by battling monsters in the void dungeons.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 15: Venom
description: Adds Venom to the roster of playable characters

name: ZPF
description: ZPF is a retro-inspired horizontal shooter for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. Blast your way through a cosmic gauntlet of epic boss battles, addictive scoring, and hidden secrets in a thrilling arcade-style adventure through fantasy, sci-fi, and alien-themed worlds.

name: Nordhold
description:
Build a city and defend it in this Tower Defense game blending Roguelite mechanics with turn-based building Strategy. Choose your hero, utilize synergistic tower upgrades, and face epic battles in procedurally generated landscapes.

Nordhold is a tower defense game for strategy enthusiasts who crave high replayability through endless combinations. Build and manage a cozy medieval Nordic village while enjoying deep tactical gameplay that doesn’t require extensive learning.

name: Chernograd
description:
Chernograd is a story-driven simulation game with multiple endings based on the player's decisions.

The player takes on the role of an employee of the Citizen Tranquility Agency, monitoring the residents of the 15th district of Chernograd. Each apartment is equipped with a system that tracks citizen activities, and any detected violations allow the player to connect to the home and apartment using video and audio recorders to find the violator, compile a report, and send it to the Department of Truth Inquiry along with all the evidence.

name: Divinastros
description: An astronomical gambling game. Fight the Olimpians while each Zodiac sign affects your cards differently in a deeply satisfying deckbuilder game. Fight Greek beasts, discover Tarot Cards and climb the Olimpus searching for revenge.

name: Hamlet in a Pond
description: Hamlet in a Pond is a unique looking relaxed city builder. Live out your creativity and build your own little slice of paradise in a tiny pond - with no pressure like goals to reach and no stress from juggling resources.

name: Super Sized Rescue Squad
description: Super sized Rescue Squad is a high energy 2D Platformer where you run, jump, and try to rescue as many little civilians as possible. All while fighting an evil cult hell bent on world domination.

name: Mordfield Command
description: Mordfield Command: a sci-fi turn-based strategy where humanity's fate hangs in the balance. Build an army and command forces to shape humanities future. Lead the resistance to victory or succumb to the control of AI overlords in this tactical, combat-focused 4X.

name: Reflex Unit: Strike Ops
description: Tactical Helicopter Action! Featuring diverse missions; stage daring rescues, manage resources, assault enemy bases and fight back against a sinister enemy. Strategic single and multiplayer gameplay, balance your aircrafts speed, firepower, fuel and load capacity to overcome challenging missions.

name: Just Keep Digging
description: Welcome to Bodie, a company mining town. Meet rising weekly profit quotas by digging deeper for rare ores and gems. Encounter ruined structures, ancient fossils, and dangerous cave dwellers. Sell your findings for company coins to upgrade your gear and keep digging!

name: Sector Zero
description: SECTOR ZERO is a reverse horror physics-based puzzle platformer where you play as a monster! You are part of The Corruption - an Alien Hive Mind Entity hunting down survivors inside the Mining Colony of Asteroid 2031 XT.

name: Below, Rusted Gods
description: A short horror game where you control an operator helping an expedition through a hole descending into the unknown.

name: Atomic Exile
description: Atomic Exile is a top down post-apocalyptic extraction shooter set in the desert wastelands of near future America. You will visit enclaves, explore devastated ruins and encounter NPCs such as other survivors, raiders, mutated beasts and rogue machines.

name: Horse Runner DX
description: Horse Runner DX is a wholesome, fast-paced platformer with a twist: You play a whole herd of horses! Combine different horses and power-ups, complete increasingly difficult challenges, chase new highscores and enjoy the ride from cute to chaotic fun.

name: Kai
description: KAI is a game of Exploration and Adventure between the sidereal space and underwater depths. Skillfully lure and guide groups of fish to solve puzzles, access new areas and uncover the truth behind the mission entrusted to you, Akira, and the other crew members aboard the ship.

name: Dice 'n Goblins
description: Explore a mysterious dungeon in this dungeon-crawler RPG. Fight with dice in turn based combat. Use your skills to make combos and beat bad luck. Loot, buy and upgrade your equipment to build a dice pool able to fend your foes, monsters and humans alike!

name: Hyas: The Side Effects Within
description: Once a person's will is "corroded," their soul will forever be lost in oblivion. You will navigate between the past and the present, exploring environments, gathering clues, avoiding unknown life forms, deducing mysteries, and ultimately uncovering the truth to return to the real world.

name: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
description: Like a lost NES release from 1993, Adventures in Gameland is a fully fleshed NES version of the new upcoming Rugrats game. This is included within the standard release and also as a standalone cartridge for your retro console.

name: Steal It
description: Owners and thieves fight to see which team has collected the most coins at the end of the game. The owners' task is to identify the thieves and lock them up. But they have to be careful not to imprison any of their own people.

name: Cube Hero
description: Cube Hero is a simple puzzle roguelike deckbuilding game. Build your own powerful deck and defeat your enemies! There are always new enemies, cubes, treasures, and events waiting for you!

name: Wandness
description: Craft wands, create synergies, battle monsters, and survive. Dive into the depths of magic crafting, where you'll forge spells from magical components and elemental gems for endless combinations. Explore procedurally generated dungeons, and unleash your magic madness to overcome the darkness.

name: Splatterbot
description: The cleaning robots have gone rogue! Up to 4-players compete in local-multiplayer to make the most mess! Utilize your environment and power-ups to overwhelm your opponents with untidiness. It's about to get messy..

name: OneFistZone
description: Undefeated in underground fighting, Yahiroako went pro. However, her first match was against with a superhumanly strong opponent!

name: Car Repair
description: Car Repair - go back in time to Poland of the 90's. Run your own car repair shop. Look for savings wherever you can. Make lots of money and avoid angry customers!

name: Vindefiant
description: A disgruntled employee is fired from his job, sparking a path of rage and destruction. Lead Alyx through his journey of vengeance and creatively kill enemies in this pixel-art adventure where you, are the villain.

name: Onychomp: Lush Journey
description: Meet the moon at the highest floor before the night is over in this high speed, roguelike dungeon crawler. Become the werewolf rat and chomp on every creature in your path, even a vampire serpent.

name: Hyperbeat
description: A rhythm game like no other. With an original soundtrack, fast paced gameplay, and unmatched heart, HYPERBEAT is a unique thrill for rhythm game veterans and rookies alike.

name: Sipssassin
description: You are the Sipssassin and your mission is to drink every drink in sight by whatever means necessary. Run, fight, sneak and drink through unique levels. Unlock new characters and find hidden secrets. Just make sure you don't get caught!

name: Greenhouse
description: Greenhouse is a gloomy and atmospheric erotic interactive fiction with an aura of mystery. You'll play as Erik, a male scalie dragon, as you navigate the sexual perils of the greenhouse.

name: Party Club
description: Party Club is a multiplayer adventure that lets you manage a lively venue with up to 4 friends. Whether it's tossing orders to patrons or cleaning up after a busy day, Party Club promises endless fun and hilarious moments with your fellow pals!

name: Flashing Dark
description: Flashing Dark is a first-person horror game about a lighthouse keeper lately transferred to a new outpost. As he struggles to manage his work, he uncovers a dark and terrifying secret of the island he lives on.

name: Randomice
description:
A procedural Metroid-like with no fights, focused on exploration and route-planning, in which you play a mouse trying to escape from an ever-changing house.

Each run is a compact Metroid-like experience, in which you will find upgrades to explore the house differently each time. From a magnetic grapple to reach a metallic faucet, to a rideable rocket that can burst through the glass blocking the way, you will find many upgrades, each with its own uses.

You must adapt to the tools in your possession to determine where you can go, the thrill of the game coming both from the platforming mastery, but also from the mental mapping of where you can go in the house at any given time. When you obtain a new item, you need to update this mental map to determine the best possibilities, optimize your path, and decide where to go next to maximize the chances to exit quickly.

The ability to follow an efficient path is important during races, in which all the competing players will have the same game configuration and must exit the house as fast as they can. But the game is also designed to be enjoyed solo and slowly, thanks to a single-player progression that lets each player discover the challenges at their own pace.

name: Deflectorium
description: Deflectorium: 2D sci-fi rogue-lite singleplayer. Deflect deadly shots back at your enemies to become unstoppable. With unique deflection system, you'll dominate battles while upgrading your skills and stats. Prepare for adrenaline experience where defense isn't just a tactic but an art.

name: The Coldest Winter
description: The Coldest Winter is a mature psychological horror game. Shiver alongside Jovanna as you navigate your way through icy landscapes and face biting decisions to make as you try to unravel the truth behind this seemingly never-ending winter.

name: School 666
description: School 666 is a 1-4 Player Co-op Survival Horror. You must escape this endless nightmare. Try to identify the correct path and survive the anomalies in this endless school. Some extremely powerful anomalies will catch you to their dimensions. Explore the reason why you are here... and don't die.

name: Space Sprouts
description: Launch into a chaotic spaceship adventure: bend the rules of physics, experiment with unusual gadgets and toss everything around. With each journey, you will have limited time to reveal the mysteries aboard your solar punk spaceship - how much will you discover before you arrive home?

name: Holy Shoot
description: In Holy Shoot, the player embarks on a journey as a member of The Sanctum. The ultimate goal is to defeat the powerful demons that represent the Seven Deadly Sins. Each character, is granted unique abilities and traits that make them valuable assets in the fight against demonic forces.

name: Gruel
description: Go on a rampage in this endless arcade Boomer-Shooter! Gain the weirdest weapons and destroy all the monsters in the never-ending temple of GRUEL!

name: Endless Tactics
description: Endless Tactics is a turn-based roguelite game. Play as the commander of a high-risk planetary mining operation, defend your base from alien creatures while trying not to get overrun. Use resources to upgrade your starship, unlock new technologies, powerups, and deadly new worlds to harvest.

name: Rogue Night
description: A rogue lite survival game - Confront hordes of undead, gather resources to build and survive. Explore locations and rescue NPCs who will aid on your journey.

name: Confined: Leaving OKB-134
description: Confined: Leaving OKB-134 is a first-person horror game for PC and VR set in an abandoned soviet bunker. You got trapped! Seek safety by reactivating power, lights and machinery. Learn about long gone personnel, solve riddles and find a way to escape. But stay quiet! You’re not alone.

name: Lidar Exploration Program
description: LiDAR Exploration Program is an atmospheric short horror game where you explore the world using a scanner.

name: Rooster
description: A heartfelt, story-rich casual puzzle adventure celebrating the best of ancient Chinese culture. Explore an exquisitely hand-drawn world with delightful surprises, from cooking, finding hidden objects, paper crafting, and more. Guide Rooster in an emotionally rewarding tale about family and love.

name: Kinsfolk
description: Kinsfolk is an emotional single player adventure game. You will embark on a journey to discover the meaning of family. Explore the beautiful world with atmospheric music. Discover and relive stories about the past.

name: Kelp Keeper
description: Take on a vital role in the ecosystem in this action-packed bullet hell. Control a charming sea otter and protect the kelp forest from an endless onslaught of devious sea critters. Skillfully dodge attacks, grab your prey, and eat them all at the surface for a huge satisfying snack.

name: Goals
description: Gameplay-first, free to play, cross-play, multiplayer-focused and esports-ready football game in which every footballer will be unique.

name: Mozentum
description: A completely unique hippie style, movement RPG / immersive adventure sim where you make your own hippy parkour being and discover the secrets of the universe. The movement mechanics in this game must be tried at least once.

name: Snake-O-Tron
description: Snake-O-Tron is a fast-paced arcade game that combines the classic snake gameplay with the racing and power-up elements of Mario Kart, all set in a futuristic Tron-like world.

name: Dead Weight
description: Challenge the Ancient Gods! Set the sails of your flying pirate ship and embark on the adventure in the steampunk world of Dead Weight. Explore floating islands in search for loot. Choose a class or create your own and enjoy turn-based tactical combat on tiny battlefields where every step matters.

name: Dengenki Days
description: Juno's rent money has gone missing! The end of the month draws near- what is an attractive and spunky girl to do in a situation like this? Join Juno and her friends as they try to earn some quick cash!

name: Flora & Fang: Guardians of the vampire garden
description: Flora & Fang: Guardians of the vampire garden is a whimsical single player or couch co-op adventure! Protect your dad's pumpkin patch from a relentless insect invasion. Engage in charming arcade action, place strategic traps, and battle it out in skill-testing boss battles. Perfect for all ages!

name: Stoneguard
description: To protect the magical Lifestone, you must strategise, manage and build a fortified settlement. Lead your fellow survivors into battle against waves of nocturnal monsters who wish to take this precious Lifestone from your world.

name: Crafty Racer
description: Stunt, push, and rush to the end! Win models and change anything as you want! Your tracks, vehicles, characters, checkpoints, opponents, ... anything!

name: Hellspresso
description: Hellspresso is a fast-paced cooking game that combines restaurant management with strategic planning and development. Serve and clean tables, design your kitchen, discover new recipes, plan your menu, switch to your secret magic kitchen, gain the trust of your customers and unlock all their secrets!

name: Axona
description: Axona is a grid-based puzzle game which requires 3-dimensional thinking and careful planning. Pick up the keys with the correct face of your cube and unlock the glyphs to open the gate in each level.

name: Animal Shelter 2
description: Welcome back to the heartwarming world of Animal Shelter 2! Provide a loving home for every four-legged friend in need – play with them, pet them, even dress them up! Get to know them and find them a loving family. Play with your friends and manage your shelter together in co-op!

name: 100% Plasma Vitae
description: Point and click game, with emphasis on narrative, time management, and luck on the dice!

name: Adventures in Lestoria
description:
In this action dungeon-crawling RPG experience, you take on the role of a fighter: Explore and travel through the lands and surrounding countries of Lestoria in search of adventure!

Your quest begins in search of slimes in a nearby forest to restock on potion-making supplies, to soon discover that bandits have attacked the locals and have caused hysteria and chaos. Who would do such an awful thing, and can you put an end to their crimes?

name: Glitchspankr
description: After a hard day of existing you just want to relax and play your favorite game, Big Booty Slapper 6! Unfortunately, there seems to be a rogue virus eating and corrupting your precious game! Using the GlitchSPANKR Antivirus software, dive into virtual worlds and Spank that Glitch! Or befriend him. Or spare his poor, ugly, miserable life. Maybe give him a smooch... fall in love... Oh, uhem. Well there are a lot of options. Just... get in there and figure it out.

name: The Valley of the Architects
description: A puzzle game, narratively grounded around architecture, adventure and elevators. Follow architectural writer Liz on a journey through Africa to uncover the secrets of a lost and forgotten Architect. Using your problem solving skills, overcome each puzzle and slowly unwrap the story of a lifetime.

name: Ooga
description: Help Ooga to retrieve his stolen food stockpile in this fast-paced, spear-based parkour platformer. Play the first world and a half in the free demo, secrets included!

name: Mirror Throne: Auto Battler
description: Assemble a party and master synergies in this Roguelite Auto Battler. Strategically place units and combine their unique abilities to defeat the Mirrored Legion. With game changing trinkets, events, and treasures, no two runs are the same. Adapt and evolve on your quest to reclaim the Mirror Throne!

name: PolyPine
description: Build your own forest! A simulation sandbox game where you grow plants and design habitats for 100s of species. Click on animals to trigger behaviors: deers poop which fertilizes the soil, bees go looking for nectar. Unlock more plants and animals as you create an increasingly diverse ecosystem.

name: Seekers of Eclipse
description: Lead your people back to the homeland! To do that you need to make it in time for the Eclipse. Choose your leader and build towns to defeat obstacles in this roguelike city builder with deck building mechanics.

name: The Red Bell’s Lament
description:
The Redbell Tree scrapes the sky, standing proudly in the heart of Hemeria, a land of sunlight. In a land ruled by a monarchy for generations, humans lived in peace and tranquility. That is, until the dawn of the day the world was dyed red.

On that day, vampires laid waste to Hemeria. They preyed on, devoured, and devastated its inhabitants. A great many people would go on to mourn their loved ones, their families and friends, for the rest of their lives. One particular town of Hemeria bore such a tragedy. A single girl was left alone in despair and disgrace. She vowed revenge, and grew into one of Hemeria's finest vampire hunters.

And one day, she became a member of the Elpis 7; those who inspired a light of hope in its people.

One day, she receives a letter from an unknown sender. Upon her arrival to the mansion indicated inside, she finds vampire hunters and a royal knight awaiting her. The hunters assembled receive an order from the monarch.

They are to form a squad and invade Nyx, the world of vampires. A shiver of anticipation crackles through her at the opportunity she's been waiting for her whole life. However, this is but the beginning of a game wherein the fate of her world is at stake. Pawns are sent forth, discarded, hidden out of sight...

And just how many will remain when this all comes to an end?

name: Rogue Realms
description: Roguelike tower defense where you craft your defense while controling your hero of choice. Navigate through procedurally generated maps and face unpredictable waves. Every run will offer a unique challenge that will make you adapt your strategy and master tower placement and upgrading!

name: Ertugrul
description: Survive the chaos of the medieval era and set out on a mysterious journey to become the hero of the innocent. Live the life like a true Turkish warrior in this semi open-world action adventure game.

name: Suzan's Potion Workshop
description: Suzan's Potion Workshop is a fast-paced match 3 game in a fantasy setting.

name: Roam
description: Roam is a 2D Action-RPG platformer with roguelike, metroidvania and survival elements in a procedurally generated open world. You have to explore the surrounding lands and the depths of mysterious caves that have existed for centuries at the bottom of the local lake.

name: Zorro and Zedd
description: Zorro and Zedd must use their magical powers to hunt down the 12 Dragon Lords of Dundalk, taking their sacred amulets and using them to access Dundalk's secret dimension. There they must defeat Octobatron the Dragon King and put an end to his 10,000 year reign of Terror!

name: Burning Sword: Death Sun
description: Burning Sword: Death Sun is a Wuxia hack n' slash game. Play as the great fighter, Zhāng Yì Xiàn, who seeks revenge for the death of his family at the hands of China's powerful Gāo Tiān Qí. Dive into a tale of revenge, redemption, martial arts, and intense swordplay.

name: Roll The Bones
description: Select spell-dice for your loadout, roll them and wreak absolute havoc! This high-paced pixelart roguelite will let you build unique loadouts with extremely interactable spells. Let's roll some bones!

name: Level Up Your Body
description: LUYB - Hit objects to the beat, dodge obstacles. Enhance strength, endurance, coordination, reflexes. Elevate in a virtual world.

name: No Vacancy Tonight
description: Imagine waking up trapped in an abandoned motel. When you manage to get out of the room, a phone rings in the distance... In this point & click adventure game in 3D, you will have to use your wit to solve puzzles and find out what happened.

name: The Lab Thing
description: The lab thing is a first-person survival horror game. Explore a mysterious secret lab and play as the only human left alive. Gather all the scientist's notes about the monster, upgrade backpack items, record information and try to escape before you join the body collection of the lab thing!

name: Fantastic Haven
description: Restore the equilibrium of magic by saving endangered fantasy creatures. Build your shelter to welcome and protect them, explore unique regions, rally neighboring populations to your cause and rehabilitate creatures in their natural environment.

name: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty
description: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty is an anime Tactical RPG. Follow Jaden, as he travels across the land and learns the truth about his country. Learn the origin of the war that leads to Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. Fight enemies in tactical combat and manage your army in this JRPG inspired journey!

name: Swordai
description: Swordai is a multiplayer, first-person, medieval slasher featuring fast paced directional combat and a deep skill tree. Master your sword as you carve your way through monsters, epic bosses, and other players in your quest to ascend the tower.

name: Nuclear Cheetah
description:
Bounce, pounce, and slide your way through fast-paced levels as Chaz, the radioactive cheetah! This retro platformer inspired by the likes of Sonic the Hedgehog and Jazz Jackrabbit features a high skill ceiling, crispy pixel art, and a bangin’ MIDI-styled soundtrack.

Nuclear Cheetah combines time attack platforming with a collect-a-thon progression system. Play through and master challenging stages, earn power orbs to unlock new areas of the castle, and save the princess; all while uncovering the story of how a once mild-mannered cheetah transformed into a green gangsta who eats toxic waste for breakfast.

name: DollHouse: Survive or Death
description: "for that child's future." "I must ...... I must to do this. The eight children who came to the mansion were waiting for a series of horrible dreams... A series of horrible nightmares... Who did this? and for what? And who did this for whom...? Only by entering the DollHouse can we find out.

name: Small Kingdoms
description: Rule a small fantasy kingdom and conquer your rivals as you build up cities and armies on the world map and command troops on the battlefield. Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and RTS game with small procedurally generated world maps, and campaigns you can complete in a weekend

name: Cactus
description: Be the cactus, become the legend! Fight to save your planet in this fast-paced single player FPS. Shoot explosive needles from your spiky body to wipe enemy hordes with timed detonations, explore the desert, solve puzzles, find artifacts, unlock special skills and battle against the sun.

name: Last Spartan: Glory Over Madness
description:
In this deck-building roguelike, you'll customize and build your own dice set to use in turn-based battles as you explore a dark, randomly generated world, full of new enemies and encounters on every run. Experience a story-driven campaign! Fight for your Sanity and defeat the Lovecraftian horrors.

Last Spartan sees you playing as the titular Last Spartan as you battle through a story-driven randomly generated campaign where keeping a grip on your waning sanity becomes increasingly difficult as you do battle with more and more enemies that draw inspiration from Greek mythology and the Lovecraft mythos.

It's a roguelike with deck-building elements. The unique part here is that your deck is actually a set of customisable dices, with each face acting as a slot for a different ability. There are over 700+ dice faces to discover, allowing you to develop and learn numerous synergies to suit your preferred playstyle, especially when god selection comes into play.

Aside from the dice, you will be accompanied on each run by an ally Greek god. There are over 10 of them currently, although they won't all be unlocked immediately, and each provides distinct active and passive abilities. With them, you can develop different strategies for dealing with the many foes you encounter.

According to the developer, for the first ten hours, you will face new enemies on every run, with over 100 regular enemies and 20-plus mini-bosses to discover and fight in turn-based combat. This should keep the game feeling fresh and surprising for far longer than other entries in the genre.

The same applies to encounters with over 200 NPCs to meet and choices surrounding them to make. Depending on your interaction, they might provide you with a reward, blessings, or even curses that will remain constant until the end of that particular run.

Some of those NPCs will make their way to your city. It's here where you respawn after dying and spend resources you've gathered throughout each run to upgrade the various buildings in a bid to rebuild Sparta. This is the more permanent side of the Last Spartan game and will eventually provide you with perks that increase your chance of completing a run and progressing the overarching story.

The indie game Last Spartan is set to come out in early access on PC/Mac/Linux via Steam in February-March 2024 and full release coming to all Platforms and major storefronts by April 2024 ( Coming to PC/Mac/Linux first and then to all major consoles like Xbox & Playstation & Nintendo Switch & IOS soon after PC and console release )

name: Vault of Power
description: Unleash your tactical prowess in 'Vault of Power', a roguelike auto-battler that plunges you into a treacherous dungeon. Draft from 60 unique skills and combine them to obtain class bonuses. Master the art of tactics, make unique builds, and become the supreme champion of the Vault.

name: Deconstruction Simulator
description: Deconstruction Simulator is a game that allows you to experience the thrilling world of demolition and recycling! Take on the role of a skilled demolition manager and transform unwanted items into valuable resources.

name: Monke Simulator
description: Peel banan, escape containment and shower your oppressors in stench. Top the scoreboards, be the fastest ape and liquefy your neurons in this stink infused parkour shooter.

name: Skogdal
description: Skogdal is the rock 'n roll deckbuilder adventure game about a crazy Norwegian town during the 90's. Draft cards, recruit followers and explore the town across multiple runs. Why have the people of Skogdal gone mad? Play cards and find out!

name: Wagon
description: Wagon is a 1-bit card game where you make tough decisions to try and survive winter on the Oregon Trail.

name: Portal Fantasy
description:
Portal Fantasy is a creature-collecting adventure RPG. Journey through an epic storyline, collecting creatures, avoiding traps, and solving thrilling quests in this online RPG with a unique take on a beloved genre. Launching soon in Q1 of 2025!

Collect unique creatures and gather ingredients to fuse and enhance your team. Discover hundreds of combinations, which can augment your creatures, teach them new skills, and even change their appearances.

Unlock Wilderness areas to battle and collect Porbles from 6 different elements with over 50 skills and 60 passive abilities. Conquer Baddies, fuse potent ingredients, and transform your Porbles into ultimate powerhouses. The battle is on!

Journey through beautiful pixelated worlds, navigating perils, solving quests, and meeting with countless quirky characters. A captivating story, tons of side content, and a charming soundtrack await you on your adventures.

Prove your mettle by tackling traps, puzzles, and obstacles. The Wilderness is a dangerous place, as you jump and maneuver across moving platforms, voids, spikes, saws, turrets, teleporters, and more.

Along your adventures, you will become strong enough to battle your fellow friends and foes alike. Meet up with friends to battle it out in PVP on your adventures!

name: Clonizer
description: Hex-based tactics meets roguelike deckbuilding! Play cards, manage clones, explore unique planets and outsmart aliens. Craft a powerful deck through your expedition and Clonize the universe to become employee of the month of CLONPO!

name: Oppidum
description: Face the challenges of Oppidum, a cooperative multiplayer adventure. Collaborate, craft, fight, and dive into a captivating story to uncover a powerful truth. A world hanging by a thread needs your help – will you answer the call?

name: Bloodrush: Undying Wish
description:
Bloodrush: Undying Wish is a top-down hack n' slash game with a dark fantasy aesthetic.

In this game, the player is encouraged to aggressively use their combat abilities to evade, control and destroy their opponents, moving around in a deadly dance of carnage.

Focused on movement abilities, split-second decision-making, and stylish strings of attacks, the game is heavily inspired by titles such as Devil May Cry, Akane, Hyper Light Drifter, Hades, and Ultrakill.

name: Aureole: Wings of Hope
description: At sonic speeds, Aureole: Wings of Hope takes platforming to the literal skies! Join Ramila and Ryleth on their crusade to reclaim their home from demonic forces in this unique physics-based side-scrolling game.

name: Yes, Your Grace: Snowfall
description: In this new reality, where monsters seem closer, enemies stronger and your petitioners struggling more than ever, your duties as a King must continue. It will be your responsibility to rebuild the trust of your kingdom, protect your family and survive the upcoming winter.

name: Grifford Academy
description: Grifford Academy is a story-rich, coming-of-age RPG set in a mystical book realm where your decisions shape the personalities of the characters. Engage in strategic turn-based combat as you set out to discover the secrets of Caldria.

name: Gotchaball
description: Gotchaball is a multiplayer fictional sports game. Players try to score points by capturing totems to win the game. Chase your opponent, tackle and steal the ball from others! Keep hold of it while capture totems to score points! Collect and use coins to capture totems even faster!

name: Finely Diced
description: Chefs are mercurial at the best of times, and catastrophically explosive at their worst. In this hospitality roguelite, your family's restaurant is balanced on a knifes edge. You have the ingredients, the stove is on, now you just need to cook.

name: Master of Luna
description: Master of Luna is a turn-based 4x strategy game in a fantasy world with powerful magic and all kinds of mystical creatures. It has tactical battles, cozy pixel art, and a mildly melancholic atmosphere.

name: Car Dealer Simulator
description: Uncover a goldmine in the used car market! Sniff out deals, buy low, modify, and sell high. Your journey from amateur grease monkey to car dealer magnate awaits. How fast will you rise in this lucrative venture?

name: Castle of Blackwater
description: Castle of Blackwater is a multiplayer social deduction game where 10 players navigate a magical 2D castle while completing tasks and uncovering hidden allegiances. Players are assigned to three different factions, each equipped with unique abilities that support their role in the game. While alive, participants use various tools to gather information and identify threats, while eliminated players can influence the outcome by collecting souls to purchase power-ups for their team. Through alliance-building, deception, and strategic ability usage, players work to ensure their faction's survival and ultimate control of the castle.

name: Alien Boom Boom
description: Join the fight against an alien invasion in this fast-paced, old-school FPS. Battle in your hometown, around the world, and even in space. Take on unique enemies and wield powerful weapons, all with a touch of classic fps sensibility. Can you save humanity from the brink of destruction? Boom boom.

name: Beacon Patrol
description: Beacon Patrol is a cooperative and relaxing tile laying exploration game. You play as captains of the Coast Guard, navigating the coast of the North Sea to secure its beacon buoys, lighthouses and waterways. Work together with your friends and score points by creating the most complete map.

name: I Had a Plan!
description: You are a Wizard, with a brilliant plan. Unfortunately you also have teammates. As you make your way through dungeons and forests alike, you need to manage your team mates… and your frustration. I Had A Plan! is a Roguelike Semi-Autobattler set in a 3D world with 2D Characters.

name: Boomerang Jack
description: Boomerang Jack is an action-adventure RPG with free-flowing combat. String together boomerang attacks with kinetic movement and upgradeable powers. Embark on a globe-trotting quest to stop the Pirate King.

name: Laws of Nadragia
description: Become a prosecutor in the totalitarian state of Nadragia. Study the laws, use the court facts to convict the guilty or unwanted by the government... Can you keep your conscience?

name: Times Trials
description: Flex your math skills with Times Trials - a 2D puzzle fighting game. Arrange falling numbers to solve equations either alone or against friends in head-to-head multiplayer.

name: Beneath
description: Plunge into a treacherous and enigmatic underwater world and brace yourself to confront the heart-stopping horrors that await as you fight against all odds.

name: Hail to the Rainbow
description: The story of a lonely young man named Ignat, who survives in the dangerous and gloomy world of post-apocalyptic cyberpunk. You have to face the trials of a new reality and plunge into the secrets of the surrounding chaos.

name: A Corgi's Cozy Hike
description: Em-bark on a therapeutic adventure as a Corgi exploring a peaceful island getaway. Climb the mountain, soar the sky, and sail the seas to uncover treasures and cozy spots. No need to rush. Relax and savor this bite-sized, open-world experience while 10% of your purchase is donated to animal shelters.

name: Rhythm Storm
description: Rhythm Storm is a roguelike bullet heaven with stunning vector graphics, rhythmic action, and overwhelming swarms of enemies. Your vehicle aims and fires automatically while everything else dances and moves to the beat in this spectacular audio-visual experience.

name: Slipgate
description: Explore a gloomy rooms of damned sci-fi base as a doomed marine, only survivor of the portal experiment. Save humanity like in 90's with your trusty shotgun, paving a way through ominous corridors inhabited by the shadows of sinners and evil spirits.

name: Super Fantasy Kingdom
description: A rougelite city builder set in a relaxing fantasy world. Explore and rebuild your kingdom to bring it back to its former glory. Defeat hordes of enemies with an always unique team of defenders. Harvest, capture, build, mine, cook, brew, feed and grow. But be prepared to watch it all burn!

name: To the Grave
description: To the Grave is a 2d horror adventure puzzle game full of oriental elements. The young girl's father died in an accident and her mother insisted on taking his body back to her hometown for burial. After solving many crises in the mysterious village, they gradually approach the truth.

name: Anomalistic Revolution
description: Unsolved mysteries, unknown questions, lies and superstitions become history. With this new invention, it is now possible to reach absolute truths from the universe of zeros and ones. Anomalistic Revolution is a a story-rich game with 2D action-runner mechanics.

name: Murder on the Stella
description: It's a murder mystery. It's an adventure. It's a cruise vacation simulator. It's different each time you play.

name: Retrace the Light
description: “Retraces the Light” is a top-down AAG. Walk through the vast abandoned ruins. Defeat the enemies coveting the HashRate of your world. Comply to the order of supreme Yuan. Fight for honors and uncover the past and future of YUAN realm.

name: Nowhere Manor
description: House of stolen devil bargains and indolent angelic aristocracy: Nowhere Manor is doomed to disappear. You can leave if you’ve got a soul … but that’s not an option for an artificially created servant such as Liber. Just how far are you willing to go escape?

name: Riddledale
description: Riddledale is a new open-world adventure centered around story and characters. Solve riddles, make fun encounters and fight ferocious creatures on a vast island full of secrets.

name: Rubato
description: A collect-a-thon about a frog fixing the solar system after it explodes for some reason.
